loans.name: Chhean

texts.en:
Chhean is 50 years old, married, and blessed with five grown children. Four of her children are already settled for marriage and live independently. Chhean devotes herself to a farming business to support her family, while her husband makes mortars and pestles from granite stone. They appreciate their businesses because they really offer great help for their family.

In order to serve her family with basic transportation so that they can get around easily, Chhean would like to take out a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase a motorcycle for personal use. She is very happy that Kiva lenders always turn their attention to low-income families such as hers, so that they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Isabel Graciela

texts.es:
La señora Isabel Graciela es madre soltera, tiene  26 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educacion primaria, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cales están estudiando, se dedica al tejido de típicos y también la venta del mismo: cortes, sabanas, servilletas, delantales, etc. inicio este negocio con su tía y hasta el momento lleva 1 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilo, incrementando así, su producción de tejidos típicos, espera tener un negocio rentable, que ayude a sufragar los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
Isabel Graciela is a single mother. She is 26 years old and completed six years of primary education. She has two children, one of whom is in school. She works by knitting and selling traditional clothing, such as skirts, sheets, napkins, aprons, etc. She started this business with her aunt and she currently has one year of experience.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to buy yarn, which will increase her production of traditional clothing. She hopes to have a profitable business, which will help pay her family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy yarn for knitting

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong, aged 44, is a humble farmer who owns and manages a two-hectare plot of farmland for growing crops. At the same time, Hong uses his buffalo-pulled trailer to transport and trade his firewood for additional income.

He is glad because his wife always helps him in earning income to satisfy their living needs and serves as his advisor in order to make their business more profitable in the future. Together, Hong and his wife have three children. The oldest child is married and the other two are still students in the local school.

As of now, Hong really needs financial assistance to apply supplies at the right time to his rice crop. But due to the lack of funds, he would like to borrow additional capital of 1,500,000 KHR to purchase 14 sacks of fertilizer to spread on his rice crop. With the help of this loan, he hopes to have an abundant harvest this year.

loans.use: to purchase 14 sacks of fertilizer to spread on his rice crop.

loans.name: Un

texts.en:
Un is 28 years old and a married woman who has been living in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She and her husband try hard in their current businesses in order to secure their family and provide basic needs to their two young children. Through their commitment and hard work, they hope that they can have a better quality of life someday. 

Un has now dedicated herself to a hog-raising business and also shares a piece of time to distill white wine; its test is recognized by people in her neighborhood. Un’s husband always helps her in managing these two businesses and in addition, he provides motorcycle transportation services to surrounding people.

To uplift the family’s economic status towards financial stability, Un decided to ask for a loan through HKL to purchase rice in stock for trading purposes, and she will also purchase feed for her pigs. Un believes that this precious loan will help her to work out her plans and reach her goals someday.

loans.use: to purchase rice in stock for trading purposes and also purchase feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
El señor Lorenzo, es casado tienen  60 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica a la venta de tomate en los días de plaza de la ciudad, inició este negocio con al apoyo de sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 11 años de experiencia, cuenta con al apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a la atención del hogar con los oficios domésticos.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de tomate, ya que El hace reventa del mismo producto los días de plaza y para mejorar  ganancia quiere amplia su venta, espera en el futuro, tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 60 years old, is married and has one child. Lorenzo did not have the opportunity to go to school. He works by selling tomatoes on market days in the city. He started this business with the help of his parents and he now has 11 years of experience. He counts on his wife's help, who works at home by taking care of domestic needs.

He is requesting a loan that he will use to buy tomatoes since he resells the same product on market days. The loan will also help him to improve profits by increasing his sales. In the future, he hopes to have a large business.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos, y debido a dificultades económicas que se le ha presentado a la familia en los últimos años, ha decidido abrir su propio negocio para trabajar fuertemente y poder contribuir en su hogar a superar estas dificultades y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Fue así como hace unos 3 años que comenzó con su almacén de venta de productos de papelería y demás productos de uso personal donde gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado generar ingresos con los que sus hijos y su esposo pueden tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para salir adelante. A pesar de que su negocio lo montó con muy bajo capital, el gran esfuerzo que ha hecho le ha permitido salir adelante y superar ciertas dificultades, y ahora que requiere surtir su almacén, busca un préstamo para comprar productos de papelería y surtir su almacén con productos que ya se han ido agotando.

Su sueño es sacar su familia adelante brindándoles una buena calidad de vida a su esposo y sus 2 hijos y poder tener mejores oportunidades económicas para superar las dificultades que se les han venido presentando.
texts.en:
Maria is married and has 2 children.  Because of economic problems that her family has faced over the past few years she decided to open her own business and work hard so that she could contribute to her household.  This way, they could overcome these difficulties and have a better quality of life.  It was in this way that, 3 years ago, she started up her store selling stationery and personal use products.  Thanks to her efforts, she's managed to generate income so that her children and husband can have a better quality of life and better opportunities to get ahead financially.  In spite of the fact that she started her business with very little capital, the great efforts she's made have allowed her to get ahead and overcome certain difficulties.  Now she needs to stock up her store, so she is looking for a loan that she will use to buy stationery products.  This way, she can stock up on the products that she's run out of.  

Maria's dream is to get ahead with her family, providing a good quality of life for her husband and their 2 children.  She also dreams of having better financial opportunities so that she can overcome any difficulties that present themselves.

loans.use: to buy stationery products to stock her store

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es:
Olinda tiene su negocio de confección de tejidos desde hace unos 12 años y con este contribuye económicamente en su hogar para que su esposo y su hijo de 8 años de edad puedan acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Desde muy joven aprendió la actividad gracias a que unos familiares se dedican a esto, y la experiencia que ha adquirido le ha servido para ofrecer a sus clientes productos de muy buena calidad. Debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital, la mayoría de su trabajo lo realiza a mano, pero ahora que su capacidad de producción no puede abastecer todos los pedidos de sus clientes, Olinda busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas y una máquina plana para aumentar su capacidad de producción.

Su sueño es sacar este negocio adelante y que este le permita seguir ofreciendo en su hogar una buena calidad de vida. Además, espera que su negocio pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Olinda has had a weaving business for 12 years, which allows her to contribute financially to the household so that her husband and 8-year-old son can enjoy a better quality of life and improved economic opportunities in order to progress. From a very young age, she learned this skill thanks to some of her family members who also worked in weaving. The experience she acquired has allowed her to offer high quality products to her customers. Because she does not have a large working capital, the majority of her work is done by hand. Now, however, her production capacity cannot satisfy all of her customers' requests. Olinda is requesting a loan to buy raw materials and a sewing machine in order to increase her production capacity.

Her dream is to grow her business, which will allow her to continue providing her household with a good quality of life. In addition, she hopes that her business will create jobs for people in need.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and a sewing machine to increase her production capacity.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia has been engaged in a business selling firewood. She says that it has been a good business. In addition to this activity, Sophia sells clothes. This helps her to cover her household expenses and earn income for future investments. 
	
Sophia is a woman who is lively, courageous, and dedicated to her work.  She also has faith that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life. She is always waiting for new opportunities to present themselves and give her the chance to make a better future doing what she enjoys.  Like all other merchants, she wants to grow her businesses, but she needs the money to back them. This is why Sophia is applying to Yehu for a loan that will allow her to buy bales of clothes for sale. She speaks highly of her previous Kiva loan, which greatly improved her business.  She has a good record of repayment.

loans.use: to buy bales of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supples.

loans.name: Kibibi

texts.en: Thanks to Kibibi's indefatigable efforts she is making progress towards improving her family’s living conditions.  She has a stall where she sells roasted meat and ugali (prepared from maize flour).  Her customers like her because of her caring nature.  Kibibi needs a loan in order to purchase chairs, tables, and a television set for her stall. This way she hopes to attract more customers and hence increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase chairs, tables,and a television set.

loans.name: Rex

texts.en:
As a former athlete, Rex has always been passionate about health and fitness. Since he loved taking care of people, he worked part-time as a paramedic until he purchased a Snap Fitness franchise in the Houston suburb of Spring. Rex said he was looking for freedom and the ability to have family time. Rex moved to Texas in 1980 from the Midwest and started a new life in the Lone Star State, marrying and starting a family. His wife and children participate in the management of this unique family-run gym in the Houston area. Rex and his family pride themselves in knowing each gym member.

Rex's gym offers a Fitness-on-Demand room, which is a virtual classroom members can use for activities such as Pilates, yoga, kickboxing, spin classes and step aerobics. Rex obtained a loan from Accion Texas Inc. to purchase a new piece of equipment to better assist his members: a TRX.  The fitness device was created by a former Navy SEAL and uses the operator's weight as resistance for a full-body workout. Rex said he doesn't want his members to feel lost in using any of his equipment and is currently offering classes on how to use the machine.

Rex's venture has created three jobs and he plans to contract with two other trainers. Since approval of the loan in late July and the purchase of the TRX, three people have signed for new memberships. Snap Fitness is open but not staffed 24 hours a day, which Rex says helps him keep membership prices lower than other gyms. Find out more about his business on his website at: www.snapfitness.com/spring.

loans.use: To purchase a TRX machine.

loans.name: Khadija's Group

texts.en:
Khadija is a 42-year-old Iraqi woman who is married and a mother of four children. With limited career options due to cultural restrictions and domestic constraints, Khadija is one of the many Iraqi women who is working from home, using her sewing skills to generate some income and participate in meeting the financial needs of her family.

Khadija has four years of experience with a small home-based business activity. Until now, she has been using an old sewing machine, mounted on a wooden board, and she sits next to the machine on the floor while working. Her work has also been often interrupted by the power cuts in her district. To make it easier for her to meet the demands and orders of her customers, she would like to buy a new sewing machine and a small generator, which will provide a constant source of electricity for her. To be able to make these purchases, she took a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq.    

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor and thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of three to five clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group. 

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for their protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and a small generator

loans.name: Fayma's Group

texts.en:
Fayma is 55 years old. She is an Iraqi woman who is married with two children. With limited career options due to cultural restrictions and domestic constraints, Fayma is one of the many Iraqi women who is working from home, using her sewing skills to generate some income and participate in meeting the financial needs of her family.

Fayma has six years of experience with this typical home-based business activity during which time she has been able to build up a nice clientele. She has been successfully meeting her clients' orders. She would like to improve her work conditions and renew her work area. She took a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq to be able to invest in and pay for the renovations. 

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

loans.use: to renovate her work area

loans.name: Pana

texts.en:
Pana is a young Iraqi woman. She is 21 years old and as a yet-unmarried woman, she is living with her family. At her home, a nice area has been separated off for her to use as a beauty salon.

She has three years of experience working as a hairdresser and would like to use the salon to its full potential, giving her customers good service and a great experience when they visit her. She would like to renew the shop as it is a little run down already and as part of the renovation works she would like to install an A/C unit, buy a small generator and purchase some quality raw materials to use in the salon.

To be able to make these improvements and purchases, she qualified for a small business loan from Relief International Microfinance Iraq for 3,000 USD.  

Pana is under 30 years old and qualifies for a 'youth loan'.

loans.use: to renovate her salon and buy an air conditioner and a small generator

loans.name: Loai

texts.en:
Loai is 21 years old and lives in Gaza.

He owns a shop for motorcycle repair and maintenance in Beithanoon. 

He asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy motorbike tires, replacement parts, and accessories. He hopes that this loan will help him improve his income and thus enlarge his project and scale of work.

loans.use: to buy morotbike tires, replacement parts, and accessories.

loans.name: Rosebetty

texts.en: Rosebetty is an active member of PMPC.  She is 61 years of age, married, and a resident of Can-asagan, San Juan, Siquijor.  Her primary livelihood is making homemade coffee for sale.  She has been engaged in the kind of activity for over five years with monthly earnings of PHP 1,000.  She also raises native chickens in the backyard to have additional income for the household.  She took a loan from PMPC to purchase raw ingredients for coffee making and to purchase feed for the chickens.  She plans to use the profit to expand her livelihood and save for her old age.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients to make coffee and feed for her chickens

loans.name: Sokhoun's Group

texts.en:
Sokhoun is a villager from a rural area located in the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Cambodia. She is 24 years old. She has two dependent daughters, all of whom are still in school. To support her family, she has been farming rice for seven years and supplementing her income by selling grocery items. Drought is the main challenge for her business. 
 
Sokhoun has been with VisionFund for five cycles and completely paid back the previous loans. The other member is in her first cycle with VisionFund. Sokhoun is leading her group of two to apply for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy pesticides for protecting her crop yield. She hopes this loan will enable her to make her crop yield more productive and earn more income so as to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy pesticides for protecting her crop yield

loans.name: Niebich

texts.en: Niebich is a new member of PMPC.  She is 42 years old and married with 3 children.  She engages in the buying and selling of copra. She has been doing this for 15 years and earns Php 5,000 each month.  She decided to become a member of PMPC to have access to financial services to support her business.  She took out her first loan from PMPC in the amount of Php 30,000 to buy more copra to sell.  She plans to use the profit to improve the living conditions of her family and support the educational needs of her children.

loans.use: To purchase more copra to sell

loans.name: Wael

texts.en:
Wael is 30 years old and lives in Gaza. He is married and lives with his wife and child.

Wael owns an electricity shop selling electricity tools and accessories.

He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy new shelves and furniture, and change the decoration of the shop. He hopes that this loan will help him increase the display of electricity tools, improve his income and provide his child with the best education.

loans.use: to buy new shelves and furniture and redecorate the shop

loans.name: Bin

texts.en: Bin is a 62-year-old married woman who has been residing in a small village of Baray district with some of her children. She has three married children and two single children. Bin is in the business of cultivating rice on her two-hectare inherited farmland. From this business, she is able to generate an income of approximately 2 USD per day. Bin is very professional in her career because she has been doing this for ages. Some of her children also help with the maintenance of the rice field and one is running a retail clothes store in a market in Phnom Penh. Recently, Bin’s daughter’s stock of clothes is decreasing and thus the number of frequent customers is also decreasing. In order to sustain this business, she has to restore her stock again. But due to the lack of funds, Bin would like to take out a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase used clothes for her daughter's retail shop. This loan will allow Bin’s daughter to maintain her customers and to keep developing her business. In the future, Bin hopes to expand both her farming business and the retail business of her daughter.

loans.use: to purchase used clothes for her daughter to sell.

loans.name: Duberney

texts.es:
Duberney aprendió desde muy joven la actividad del corte y cepillado del cabello y gracias a que ya tiene una amplia experiencia en la actividad, su salón de belleza es muy reconocido y esto le ha permitido superar las dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida. Debido a que proviene de una familia con escasos recursos económicos, Duberney ha montado su negocio con los implementos básicos que requería, pero gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacarlo adelante y brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes. Buscando mejorar sus ingresos, Duberney busca un préstamo para comprar una vitrina y productos de belleza para surtirla y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes.

Su sueño es llegar algún día a poder tener un salón de belleza muy reconocido y generar empleo para más personas, ya que ahora tiene la oportunidad de generar 1 empleo.
texts.en:
From a very young age, Duberney learned the business of cutting and styling hair. Thanks to the fact that he already has extensive experience in the area, his beauty salon is very well known and this has allowed him to overcome the difficulties that have arisen in his life. Since he comes from a family with limited economic resources, Duberney started the business with only the basic equipment that he required, but thanks to his daily hard work, he has managed to keep going and provide his clients with good service. Looking to improve his income, Duberney is seeking a loan to purchase a display case and beauty products to stock it so that he can respond to client demand. 

His dream is to one day be able to have a very well-known beauty salon that employs more people, since now he has the opportunity to create one job.

loans.use: to buy a display case and stock it with beauty products to respond to client demand.

loans.name: Luz Enith

texts.es:
Luz Enith es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas dificultades en su vida, pero gracias a la fortaleza que siempre la ha caracterizado ha logrado salir adelante superando las adversidades y seguir brindando una buena calidad de vida en su hogar. Luz Enith es madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos de 13 y 17 años de edad debido a que el padre de sus hijos los abandonó hace unos años sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento. Para generar los ingresos, Luz Enith trabajaba en una empresa de confección, pero debido a que se quedó sin empleo hace unos años, decidió comprar una máquina de confección con su liquidación y comenzar a trabajar por su propia cuenta desde su casa. A pesar del poco capital con el que ha contado, gracias al esfuerzo que ha hecho su taller de confección ha venido creciendo y esto le ha permitido ir superando las adversidades de su hogar; y ahora que tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, busca un préstamo para comprar una máquina recubridora que le permita aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller y así responder a los grandes pedidos de sus clientes.

Su sueño es poder tener un taller de confección grande donde pueda generar empleo para las demás personas y desde el cual sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a auna educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Luz Enith is a person who has had to pass through many difficulties in her life, but thanks to the strength that has always characterized her, she has been able to succeed and overcome adversity and continue to provide a good quality of life for her family.  Luz Enith is a single mother and head of the household with two children ages 13 and 17.  The father of her children abandoned them some years ago without making any economic contribution for their care.  In order to generate income, Luz Enith worked in a tailor's shop, but since she became unemployed a few years ago, she decided to purchase a sewing machine from the business's liquidation sale, and she began to work for herself from home.  In spite of the minimal capital which she has had, and thanks to her efforts, her sewing shop has been growing and this has allowed her to overcome the adversities of her home life.  Now that she has large orders from her clients, she is looking for a loan in order to purchase a serger sewing machine that will permit her to increase the capacity of her shop's production and thus respond to the large requests from her clients.

Her dream is to be able to have a large tailor's shop where she could generate employment for more people and from which her children would gain the opportunity to have a better quality of life and access to a higher quality education.

loans.use: to purchase a serger sewing machine that will permit her to increase the capacity of her shop's production and thus respond to the large requests from her clients.

loans.name: Porferia

texts.en: Porferia is a new individual member of PMPC. She is 56 years old and married with five children, four of whom are adult-age and one of whom is school age.  She has been engaged in buying and selling copra for a period of 20 years with an average monthly income of PHP 8,000. She decided to be a member of PMPC to have financial access to support her business. She took her first loan from PMPC for PHP 30,000 to buy more copra from the farmers. She planned to use the profit to expand the business and support the educational needs of her student.

loans.use: to purchase more copra to sell

loans.name: Boris José

texts.es:
Boris se ha dedicado unos 30 años a la actividad de la agricultura, pues aprendió desde muy temprana edad junto a su padre todas las labores del campo y desde entonces viene trabajando en esta para generar sus ingresos. Actualmente Boris se encuentra casado y tiene 4 hijos y para generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar tiene un cultivo que a pesar de presentar algunas dificultades, siempre ha luchado por sacarlo adelante y poderle brindar a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Hace aproximadamente 1 año el invierno estuvo a punto de destruirle sus cosechas y esto hizo que su situación económica y la de su familia se viera fuertemente afectada; por esto ahora busca un préstamo para comprar abono y reabonar sus cultivos y poder sacar productos de buena calidad para recibir un buen precio por ellos.

Su mayor sueño es llegar a brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida que a la que pueden acceder actualmente y también ofrecerles a sus 4 hijos una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Boris has been working for 30 years in agricultural production.  He learned to do field work from a very young age by working with his father, and since then he has been working in this field to generate income.  Currently Boris is married and has four children and in order to generate the income that his family requires he raises crops.  In spite of encountering some difficulties, he has always struggled to succeed and to bring his family a better quality of life.  Approximately one year ago the winter was at the point of destroying his harvest and it severely affected his economic situation and that of his family.  For that reason he is now looking for a loan in order to purchase fertilizer and to re-fertilize his fields in order to harvest good quality products and be able to receive a good price for them.

His greatest dream is to provide his family with a better quality of life than what they can currently access, and also to offer his four children a higher quality education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and to re-fertilize his fields in order to harvest good quality products and be able to receive a good price for them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tables and chairs, an awning, and working tools for her business.

loans.name: Yina Aracelly

texts.es: Yïna de 34 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos uno en secundaria y el otro en primaria, los que ha sacado adelante con su trabajo, ella trabaja desde hace 16 años, como auxiliar de enfermera; ha mejorado su casa con esfuerzs propio y creditos que le han permitido mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo que se siente muy agradecida con Kiva que le ha brindado esta oportunidad de creditos y a la vez esta solicitando el credito con el objetivo de terminar de construir su vivienda, pues con el credito anterior logro cambiar el techo de la casa y repellar una pared de adentro, quedandole pendiente el repello  de tres paredes por dentro de la casa y las de afuera; por lo que va poco a poco logrando su meta. su mayor sueño es ver terminada su vivienda y mejorar sus condiciones de vida que sus hijos crezcan en un hogar agradable y digno de habitar.
texts.en:
Yïna, 34, is a single mother of two children, one in secondary school and the other in elementary school, whom she has gotten ahead with her job.  She has worked for 16 years as a nurse assistant.

She has improved her house with her own effort and loans that have allowed her to improve her living conditions.  For this she is grateful to Kiva, which has given her this opportunity for loans.

She is requesting this loan with the goal of finishing construction on her home.  With the previous loan she managed to change the roof of the house and plaster an inside wall, leaving unresolved the plastering of three inside walls of the house and the outside ones.  So little by little she is achieving her goal.

Her biggest dream is to finish her house and improve her living conditions so her children grow up in a pleasant and decent home to live in.

loans.use: to plaster three inside walls of the house and the outside ones

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for his business

loans.name: Marlon Abraham

texts.es: El joven Marlon de 30 años de edad, casado, habita en Colonia Los Laureles, es pequeño agricultor, es considerado como una persona  trabajadora, responsable y de buenas culturas.  Desde su pequeñes se ha dedicado al trabajo del campo, realizando actividades agricolas y pecuarias, las cuales se convierten en su principal  fuente de trabajo y las que le generan  ingreso economico para el sustento de su familia y sus compromisos de pago, trabaja en conjunto con su suegro en su unidad de produccion. Nesecita este financiamiento para invertirlo en establecimiento de 1.5 Mzs del cultivo de Yuca, asi como preparacion del terreno con el proposito que su produccion sea de calidad y le genere mayor utilidad.  Su sueño es que su familia se mantenga unida y que no le haga falta el pan de cada dia.
texts.en:
Marlon, age 30, is married and lives in the Los Laureles neighborhood.  He is a small farmer, who is considered to be a hard-working, responsible, and well-mannered person. 

He has been working in the fields farming and working with livestock ever since he was little.  This has become his main source of work, and it generates income to support his family and his payment obligations.  He works in the fields together with his father-in-law.

He needs this loan to invest in establishing 1.5 “manzanas” [a manzana is a land measurement equal to 1.740 square meters] for yucca crops.  This way he will prepare the land so that his production will be good quality and generate greater profits for him.

His dream is to keep his family close and that they do not want for their daily bread.

loans.use: to plant yucca.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant yucca.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana es una joven emprendedora de 20 años de edad que con un gran esfuerzo ha logrado sacar su propio negocio adelante. Hace un tiempo un amigo suyo le explicó la actividad y con mucha tenacidad decidió abrir su propio vivero con el cual ha venido generando ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente con su familia para tener mejores oportunidades económicas y una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar. A pesar de que su vivero lo montó con muy bajo capital, el esfuerzo que ha venido haciendo le ha permitido crecer y ofrecer a sus clientes cada vez una mayor variedad de productos. Buscando satisfacer los requerimientos de sus clientes, y debido a que no cuenta con un capital suficiente, Liliana busca un préstamo para comprar plantas e insumos para surtir su vivero.

Su mayor sueño es sacar este negocio adelante y ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de plantas. Además, aspira que este le genere ingresos con los cuales su familia tenga la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Liliana is a young entrepreneur, 20 years of age, and with great effort she has been able to get her own business started.  Some time ago a friend of hers explained the activity and with much tenacity Liliana decided to open her own nursery with which she has been generating income and contributing economically to her family in order to have better financial opportunities and a better quality of life in her home.  In spite of starting her nursery with very limited capital, her efforts have allowed it to grow and allowed her to offer her clients a better variety of products.  Looking to satisfy the requests of her customers, and since she does not have sufficient capital, Liliana is looking for a loan in order to purchase plants and fertilizers to stock her nursery.  

Her greatest dream is to have a successful business and to offer her clients a larger variety of plants.  In addition, she hopes that this will generate income that will give her family the opportunity to have a better quality of life and better economic opportunities in order to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase plants and fertilizers to stock her nursery.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es:
Samuel de 34 años de edad, casado, habita en comarca Masayita, se dedica a la Ganaderia, conocimientos heredados de sus Padres quienes lo enseñaron a trabajar y hacer una persona culta, proviene de una familia responsable y muy querida, por lo que el Sr. Samuel es bien conocido en la Comunidad, trabaja en coordinacion con su papá, con sudor de su trabajo ha mejorado su finca y mentiene en buen estado sanitario su hato ganadero, ya que obtiene sus ingresos economicos de la comercializacion de leche, terneros y venta de granos basicos; asi tambien venta de Tuberculos y Reaices.

Solicita este financimiento para invertirlo en la preparacion del suelo para la produccion de dos manzanas de yuca con el proposito de seguir incrementando su economia y brindarle estabilidad y mejores condiciones a su familiae.
texts.en:
Samuel is 34 years old. He is married and lives in the Masayita region. He raises livestock, a skill inherited from his parents, who taught him to work and to become a cultured person. He comes from a responsible and much-loved family, and for this reason Señor Samuel is well known in the community. He works with his father. With the sweat of his work he has improved his land, and he keeps his pastures in good and sanitary conditions, since he obtains income from selling milk, calves, and basic grains. He also sells tubers and root crops.

He is applying for this loan to invest in the preparation of two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of land to produce yucca, with the plan to continue increasing his income and offer stability and better conditions to his family.

loans.use: to buy the supplies necessary to grow yucca.

loans.name: Horacio Lucio

texts.es:
El Sr. Horacio de 52 años de edad, Agricultor, Casado, habita en la Colonia la Fonseca donde realiza las actividades pecuarias y Agricolas, es una persona bien querida por la comunidad, amable, cariñoso y con excelentes recomendaciones, ejerce esta labor desde muy niño ya que continua la secuencia de sus padres que le enseñaron estos trabajos de campos, su esposa coolabora con los trabjos de la casa y sus hijos le ayudan en la finca.  El señor Horacio tiene su finca con buenas condiciones para su hato ganadero, y lo que es el cultivo de Raices y tuberculos mantiene el suelo preparado para obtener sus productos de calidad. 

Solicita este credito, para utilizarlo en el establecimiento de 2 Mzs de cultivo de Yuca para luego comercializarlos y generar mayores ingresos. 

Tiene mucho deseo de salir adelante en su económia y asi ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Señor Horacio is 52 years old. He is married and is a farmer. He lives in La Fonseca, the setlement where he carries out his livestock and farming activities. He is a person who is much-loved in his community. He is kind and caring and has excellent references. He has been doing this work since he was a young child, since he is continuing the tradition that his parents taught him, working in the fields. His wife collaborates with the housework, and his children help him in the fields. Señor Horacio has his property in good condition for his cattle ranching, and for growing roots and tubers he keeps the earth prepared to obtain quality products.

He is applying for this loan to plant 2 manzanas (about 3.5 acres) with yucca that he will later sell to generate more income.

He has a great desire to advance economically and to thus offer better living conditions to his family.

loans.use: to plant yucca.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
El productor Mateo, habita en la Colonia el Serrano, desde joven desarrolla sus actividades en su finca, dedicandose a la produccion de raices, y tuberculos; además recibe ingreso de la comercialización de productos de leche; desde hace unos 7 años ha trabajado con creditos que le ha financiado la institución AFODENIC, de los cuales ha sacado provecho para mejorar su calidad de vida del él y su Familia.  
Es una persona honesta trabajadora con animo de superar por lo que, esta vez solicita credito a Kiva para establecimiento de una manzana de yuca ya que utilizara insumos para la preparacion del suelo.  

Su esperanza es obtener una excelente produccion para que en el tiempo de cosecha poder comarcializarla al mejor precio y obtener mayor ganancia.
texts.en:
The grower Mateo lives in Colonia el Serrano.  Since he was young he has developed his activities on his farm, making a living from the production of roots and tubers.  He also receives income from the sale of milk products.  For about seven years he has worked with loans that the institution Afodenic has financed to him, from which he has benefited in order to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

He is an honest and hardworking person with the spirit to overcome so this time he is applying for a loan with Kiva for the establishment of about 1.72 acres of yucca.  He will use the supplies for the preparation of the soil.

His hope is to obtain an excellent production so that at harvest time he will be able to sell it at the best price and obtain a greater profit.

loans.use: to plant yuca.

loans.name: Herminsul

texts.es:
Herminsul se dedica desde hace unos 4 años a la actividad de la crianza y venta de ganado, y es con esta actividad que ha logrado cubrir los gastos de su hogar donde convive con sus 2 hijos de 10 y 13 años de edad, y ya que su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, toda la carga económica recae encima suyo. Buscando responder a los pedidos de sus clientes y poder mejorar la situación económica de su hogar, Herminsul busca un préstamo para comprar un ternero y responder a sus clientes con los pedidos que tiene.

Su sueño es poder sacar su negocio adelante y que este le siga permitiendo superar las grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Además, aspira a que en su familia puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para salir adelante. Herminsul espera poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Herminsul has been working for some 4 years raising and selling livestock, and it is with this business that he has succeeded in covering the expenses of his household, where he lives with two children, ages 10 and 13. And since their mother abandoned them some time ago without making any economic contribution for their support, all the economic responsibility falls upon him. Seeking to respond to the orders of his customers and to be able to improve the economic situation of his household, Herminsul seeks a loan to buy a calf and respond to his customers with the orders he has.

His dream is to be able to move his business forward and that this continues allowing him to overcome the great adversities that have been presented to him in life. In addition, he hopes that his family can have a better quality of life and bigger economic opportunities to advance. Herminsul hopes to be able to offer his children an education of better quality.

loans.use: to buy a calf and respond to the customers' orders that he has

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tables, chairs and soft drinks

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is a 47-year-old married woman from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She has six children. Her eldest is 21 and the youngest is 11. 

Amalia provides for her family by investing in a fishing business. She has a fishing boat that operates for fishing. She is also into seaweed farming. This business has been in existence for 20  years now. 

She is asking for a loan to buy straw, wooden stakes, gasoline and fishing nets. She know that these are very important for her business to continue on a daily basis for a better income. Her profit will provide her family with a healthy diet as well as cover school fees. In the future, she would like to expand her business and have a new boat.

loans.use: to buy straw, wooden stakes, gasoline and fishing nets.

loans.name: Abahetsi B/ Gkn Group

texts.fr:
Samuel fait partie du groupe AbahetsiB/Gkn. Le nom du groupe signifie «mise en commun de leur force ». Il a 40ans, il est marie avec 3 enfants de 8ans à 2 ans. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de l’école primaire.

Samuel est agriculteur du riz. C’est sa première  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre pour son agriculture du riz.

Pour accroitre son agriculture du riz, il planifie de sollicite d’autre crédits. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait agrandir ces  champs du riz pour satisfaire les marchés. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer les frais scolaire pour ses enfants et payer les frais  médicaux pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Samuel is a member of the AbahetsiB/Gkn group. The name of the group means "pooling their strength." Samuel is 40 years old, married with 3 children between the ages of 2 and 8. He has 6 years of elementary school education. 

Samuel is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use his loan to purchase artificial fertilizer and to pay the labor costs of harvesting his rice. In order to grow his rice farming business, Samuel plans to apply for other loans. 

In the next few years, Samuel would like to expand his rice fields to meet the demand of the markets. With the profits, he foresees being able to pay for his children's schooling and to pay for his family's medical expenses.

loans.use: to purchase artificial fertilizer and to pay the labor cost for harvesting his rice

loans.name: Ahime

texts.fr: Ahimé est une revendeuse de matelas, coussins et draps au marché. Elle a 30 ans, mère de 03 enfants tous scolarisés et âgés de 10, 08 et 06ans. Elle sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES  pour assurer le ravitaillement  et utiliser les profits obtenus pour ouvrir une maroquinerie. elle est dans l'activité il y a 02ans.
texts.en: Ahimé is a reseller of mattresses, cushions, and sheets at the market. She is 30 years old and the mother of 3 children, ages 6, 8, and 10, all of whom attend school. She is requesting her first loan with WAGES to supply herself and to use the profits generated in order to open a leather shop. She has been in business for the last two years.

loans.use: to purchase mattresses, cushions, and sheets

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr: Enseignant de profession Monsieur Koffi pratique aussi le commerce comme activité secondaire. Il est marié avec un enfant unique  de 08 ans qui est scolarisé. Il sollicite son quatrième prêt  auprès de notre institution  pour acheter des produits génériques et chinois. Avec les profits il espère ouvrir d'autres points de vente dans les localités lointaines.
texts.en: A teacher by trade, Koffi is also in business as his secondary activity. He is married with one child, 8 years old, who attends school. Koffi is requesting his fourth loan from the organization in order to purchase generic and Chinese products. With the profits he hopes to open other points of sale in further away locations.

loans.use: to purchase generic and Chinese products

loans.name: Jose Jesus

texts.es:
Jose inició con la venta de fritos debido a que se quedó desempleado y encontró esta oportunidad para generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar donde convive con sus 2 hijos. A pesar de que con muy poco capital comenzó su negocio, su esfuerzo le ha permitido salir adelante y lograr ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida. Jose requiere hacerle algunos arreglos a su carrito donde prepara los fritos y tenía unos ahorros destinado para ello, pero debido a que el invierno le ocasionó unos daños en su hogar, tuvo que destinar el dinero para reparar los daños que ocasionó el invierno en su hogar y ahora no tiene dinero para poder reparar su carrito. Es por esto que Jose busca un préstamo para reparar su carrito donde prepara los fritos, pues necesita reparar sus llantas, la carpa y otras partes más.

Su sueño es poder sacar este negocio adelante y que le permita ofrecerles a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades para salir adelante. Además, espera que su negocio le genere mejores ingresos y pueda arreglar su hogar para prevenir que el invierno le vuelva a ocasionar daños.
texts.en:
Jose began selling fried snacks because he was unemployed and found this opportunity to generate the income that he needed in his household, where he lives with his two children. In spite of the fact that he began his business with very little capital, his effort has permitted him to advance and succeed in offering his children a good quality of life. Jose needs to make some repairs to his cart where he prepares fried snacks, and he had some savings destined for this, but because the winter caused some damage to his home, he had to use the money to repair the damage that the winter caused in his home, and now he has no money to be able to repair his cart. It is because of this that Jose is seeking a loan to repair his cart where he prepares the fried snacks, since he needs to repair its tires, the awning, and other additional parts.

His dream is to be able to move this business forward and that it will allow him to offer his two children a better quality of life and better opportunities to advance. In addition, he hopes that his business will generate better income for him and that he can repair his house to prevent the winter from again causing damage.

loans.use: to repair the cart where he prepares fried snacks, since he needs to repair its tires, the awning, and other parts

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Spécialisée dans la revente des fournitures scolaires, Amélé est une jeune mère  célibataire de 29 ans avec 03 enfants. Elle  exerce ce commerce à la maison depuis 2008. Elle sollicite son cinquième prêt  auprès de notre institution pour acheter des fournitures scolaires pour  renforcer son commerce, ce qui lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins surtout éducatifs  de ses enfants.
texts.en: Amélé is a 29-year-old single mother with 3 children who specializes in reselling school supplies. She has operated her business out of her home since 2008. Amélé is requesting her fifth loan in order to purchase school supplies to strengthen her business, which will allow her to provide for her family's needs, especially her children's schooling.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies

loans.name: Abundio

texts.en:
Abundio is a 23-year-old man from San Miguel, Bohol. He is a father to a baby boy who is only one year old. 

For the sake of his baby, Abundio works hard on his motorcycle carrying passengers so they can reach their destination. This business started five years ago. At the moment, he is asking for a loan to buy an extra tire and pay for vulcanizing to maintain the good performance of his motorcycle. 

Abundio's income will be used for his baby's needs, like diapers and milk. In the future, he hopes to have another type of transportation business that will generate a better income for his child.

loans.use: to buy an extra tire and pay for vulcanizing.

loans.name: Aine

texts.en: Aine hails from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is 23 years old, married and with three children ages five, seven, and eight. She is engaged in a fishing business and also operates boat that transports passengers from her town to Talibon. Her business started seven years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, gasoline, and pay for boat repair and maintenance. In the future, she would like to expand her fishing business by adding more fishing boats that she can maximize for a good profit. This will then help so she can better support her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, gasoline, and pay for boat repair and maintenance

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy thread for weaving skirts.

loans.name: Ferdinand

texts.fr: Marié et père de 04 enfants  Monsieur Ferdinand est un revendeur d’articles  de quincaillerie âgé de 34 ans. Il dispose de sa boutique et emploie une personne. Il sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter d’autres articles de quincaillerie  pouvant lui permettre de devenir plus tard un grossiste. Il espère  ainsi utiliser le profit qu’il tirera de son commerce  pour assurer  les études  de ses enfants et leur épanouissement.
texts.en:
Ferdinand is 34 years old, married and the father of 4 children. He is a reseller of hardware items. He has a shop and employs 1 person.

Ferdinand is requesting his first loan through WAGES in order to purchase more hardware items which may allow him to later become a wholesaler. He also hopes to use the profit from his business to provide for his children's education and their self-fulfillment.

loans.use: to purchase hardware items

loans.name: Lamouratou

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits cosmétiques et accessoires de femmes au marché,  Lamouratou est marié à un chauffeur et a 04 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Elle fait souvent face à des ruptures de stock et  sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter   ses produits de commerce en plus grande quantité. Elle souhaite ainsi agrandir son étalage et couvrir les besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Lamouratou is a reseller of cosmetic products and women's accessories in a market; she is married to a chauffeur and has 4 children, two of whom attend school. 

She often faces being completely out of stock, and so Lamouratou is requesting her first loan with WAGES in order to purchase the items for her business in a larger quantity. She would also like to expand her display stall and to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, cosmetic products, and jewelry

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is a 44-year-old married woman from Bohol, Philippines. She's been in the retail business of firewood for two years now.

She is asking for a loan worth 5000 PHP to buy firewood and pay the school fees of her children. Rufina believes that this loan could help her improve her business.

In the future, Rufina wants to invest in more lucrative ventures and send her children to school for a better education.

loans.use: to buy firewood and pay school fees of children.

loans.name: Abaawa Hagar Group

texts.en: Memuna is forty six years old. She is married with four children. She is a food vendor and sells “waakye”. Waakye is cooked rice and beans enjoyed with tomato stew, macaroni and fish. It is very tasty and satisfying and almost all tribes in Ghana enjoy waakye. She wants to use the loan to buy more bags of rice, vegetable oil, beans, macaroni, and vegetables to increase her stock of goods. She also hopes to save to be able to open a local restaurant and also make sure her children receive good education. She belongs to the community group called “Abaawa Hagar” Trust Group. In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral to access loans and peer pressure to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase stock

loans.name: Margie

texts.en: Margie is a member of PMPC's micro-finance program. She is 39 years old, married with 2 school-aged children.  She is residing in Ponong, Siquijor, Siquijor. She has been engaged in retailing gasoline for less than a year with a monthly average earnings of Php 2,500.  She took a loan from PMPC in the amount of Php 5,000 to purchase more stock of gasoline for sale.  She plans to use the profit to support the educational needs of her children and put up more capital for the business.

loans.use: to purchase more gasoline stock for sale

loans.name: Soth

texts.en:
Soth is a small farmer who has been dedicated to a rice farming business for her primary source of income for many years. She has learned to handle this business from her ancestors and it’s the only legacy her parents handed down to her. Soth is 38 years old and married with three school-aged children who are attending school and in needs of daily allowances. Soth wants to ensure the further education to her three children, so she has tried hard in her farming business and also devotes her spare time to a handicraft business – making items and containers from clay such as cookers and pots.

With the loan amount she has requested, Soth will add to her savings to renovate her house so that her family could have a suitable house to live in. She will purchase planks of wood to replace broken wallboards and floorboards. She is very thankful for the great support and she promises to pay her loan back on time.

loans.use: to purchase planks of wood to replace broken wallboards and floorboards.

loans.name: Ny

texts.en:
Ny is 30 years old and a resident living in Kampong Chhnang province, Cambodia. She is married with a young child attending school. Ny is a responsible housewife who always pays full attention to her household and educates her only child while her husband works as a government officer. Her husband is the main income provider of this family. Aside from his work schedule, Ny’s husband spends part of his time fishing in order to raise more income.

Ny is now asking for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase fishing materials for the current business because her existing materials were ruined due to long-time use. She hopes that Kiva lenders will help her and her family with financial solvency to develop her family-owned businesses.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials

loans.name: Ramiro Abel

texts.es: Ramiro de 18 años de edad, es soltero y se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Mecánica Automotriz. Decidió estudiar esta carrera porque sintió interés por los motores desde que empezó a trabajar con su tío en el pintado de autos. Actualmente está cursando el tercer ciclo ya que empezó a estudiar desde hace un año. Su objetivo para cuando termine de estudiar es laborar en una empresa de automotores, reparando y acondicionando todo tipo de motores como de autos y motos. Él utilizó el préstamo en la compra de una computadora el cual le ayudará a concretar sus tareas que le dejan en el lugar donde se encuentra estudiando. Ramiro se siente muy tranquilo y alegre por haber conseguido el préstamo, ya que ahora podrá realizar sus trabajos en su casa sin la necesidad de alquilar una cabina de internet. Su mayor sueño en la vida es terminar de estudiar su carrera y continuar estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Automotriz. Uno de los mayores obstáculos que ha tenido hasta el momento ha sido el no poder contar con dinero para que comience a estudiar su carrera. Ramiro se siente muy contento y feliz al saber que personas de todo el mundo están financiando el préstamo que recibió, a quienes también les da las gracias por esa gran oportunidad y apoyo que está recibiendo, ya que esto facilita a que él pueda terminar  de estudiar su carrera profesional.
texts.en: Ramiro, who is 18 years old, is single and is studying for a career as an auto mechanic. He decided to study for this career because he has been interested in motors since he began to work with his uncle painting cars. Now he is in his third semester, since he began this course of study a year ago. His goal when he finishes studying is to work in an automotive business, repairing and adjusting all types of motors, such as for cars and motorcycles. He will use the loan to purchase a computer, which will help him complete the homework he receives in the school where he is studying. Ramiro feels pleased and happy to have received the loan, since now he can complete his work at home without having to rent an internet booth. His biggest dream in life is to finish this course of study and continue studying to be an automotive engineer. One of the biggest obstacles that he has had up to now has been not having the money so that he could begin his course of study. Ramiro feels very pleased and happy to know that people from all over the world are financing the loan he is receiving, and he also thanks them for this great opportunity and support that he is receiving, since this will help him finish studying for his professional career.

loans.use: to buy a computer for his schoolwork

loans.name: Dúo San Vicente Group

texts.es:
DUO SAN VICENTE
Es integrada por las  señoras María Verónica 25 años es originarias del municipio de San Juan Sacatepéquez, Maria Verónica  líder de este grupo quien desde hace 5 años  inicio su negocio en  la venta de servilletas, y ropa típica, doña Verónica   realiza semanalmente la  entrega de 12 docenas de servilletas los cuales son distribuidos en otros departamentos  por otra señora negociante, es por eso que esta solicitando este crédito para la compra de servilletas, y ropa tipica, espera que kiva le pueda ayudar con el crédito solicitado para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en: María Verónica, 25 years old, is a member of Duo San Vicente and is originally from the town of San Juan Sacatepéquez. Maria Verónica, who is the leader of this group, started her business in the sale of towels and typical clothing 5 years ago. Weekly, she makes 12 dozen towels which are distributed to other areas by another business woman. It is for that that she is requesting this loan for the purchase of towels, and typical clothing. She hopes that kiva can help her with the requested loan to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy towels and typical clothing to sell.

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Dúo Sagrado Corazón De Santo Tomas Group

texts.es:
Dúo Sagrado Corazón de Santo Tomas
Este dúo esta conformado por doña  Verónica Julissa, ella  tiene 28 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de pan y pasteles en su panadería que fundó hace 8 años, ella tiene una niña de 6 años de edad y está solicitando el crédito para la compra de un mueble para vender café, capuchino y chocolate ya que su negocio está en le mercado y por las mañanas y tardes sus clientes solicitan este tipo de bebida y su capital le cubre solo para la preparación de pan y pasteles de fruta ella comenta que su especialidad es vender y hacer pan de queso,Tambien Parte de su crédito lo nececita para la compra frutas para la elavoración de pasteles. espera que le puedan dar ese apoyo que nececita para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en: One half of Dúo Sagrado Corazón de Santo Tomas (St. Thomas' Sacred Heart Duo) is Verónica Julissa, a 28-year-old who makes a living selling bread and pastries in a bakery she founded eight years ago. She has a 6-year-old daughter and is requesting the loan to purchase furniture to sell coffee, cappuccino and chocolate. Her business is already in this market, and during the mornings and afternoons her customers request these kinds of drinks, but her capital only covers making bread and fruit pastries. Verónica says her specialty is making and selling cheesebread. She plans to use a portion of her loan to buy fruits to make her pastries. She hopes that you lend the support she needs to continue with her business.

loans.use: to purchase furniture to sell coffee, cappuccino and chocolate, and to buy fruits to make pastries.

loans.name: Kodjovi

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 26ans, Kodjovi est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants en charge. Il est brodeur de profession. En 2009, il a ouvert son atelier et fait de jolies broderies à ses clients de parts et d’autres de la ville de Lomé. Il sollicite un premier crédit pour acheter de la machine à coudre afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Il veut agrandir son activité par l’achat des machines à coudre et se marier plus tard.
texts.en:
Kodjovi is 26 years old and single, with no children in his care.  He is a professional embroiderer.  He opened his own shop in 2009 and provides beautiful embroidery services to his customers who come from all over Lomé.

He is requesting his first loan for the purchase of a sewing machine which will help him to better meet his customers' needs.

He wants to buy additional sewing machines to expand his activity, and would like to get married in the future.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for embroidery.

loans.name: Martha Celsa

texts.es:
Martha Celsa,tiene 41 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, quienes son su motor y motivo para esforzarse y dar lo mejor de ella para lograr sus metas y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Actualmente viene realizando sus trámites para obtener su título profesional en la carrera de enfermería, paralelamente ha iniciado un curso de Inglés el cual le sirve para complementar su carrera y ser mas competitiva en su campo profesional. Ella trabaja como enfermera técnica por lo cual su mayor obstáculo es la falta de tiempo, ya en el día debe estudiar, trabajar y al final le queda muy poquito tiempo para sus hijos, pero ellos saben que es un sacrificio que muy pronto dará sus frutos.
Está muy agradecida a los inversionistas que hacen posible el sueño de muchas personas que como ella por carencias económicas se le dificultaba terminar su carrera profesional, gracias al poyo recibido le falta muy poco para obtener su titulo y así poder acceder a un un mejor puesto de trabajo y a un mejor honorario.
texts.en: Martha Celsa is 41 years old and has two children, who are what drives her and motivates her to work hard and give her best to achieve her goals and make headway. She is currently going through the process of earning her nursing degree, while at the same time starting to take a course in English to complement her degree and make her more competitive in the professional arena. She works as a nursing assistant, so her biggest obstacle is a lack of time, since she has to study, work and spend a little time with her children, but they know that it is a sacrifice that will soon bear fruit. She is very grateful for the lenders who have made possible the dreams of many people like her who have difficultly earning professional degrees because of economic hardships. Thanks to the support she has received she will have her degree very soon and thus have access to better jobs and salaries.

loans.use: to pay for her nursing degree.

loans.name: Adame

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique, Madame Adame a 28ans. Elle est mariée à un électricien et ils ont 01 enfant de 03 ans en charge. Elle sollicite de WAGES un second prêt pour acheter des marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut agrandir l’activité, avoir d’autres points de vente et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille. Elle a démarré il y a 07ans.
texts.en:
Adame is 28 years old and resells general food products in a shop.  She is married to an electrician with whom she raises a three-year-old child. 

She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy some food supplies and better meet her customers' needs.

She wants to expand her activity and have other retail outlets.  She also wants to ensure the happiness of her family.  She started in this business seven years ago.

loans.use: to buy general food products.

loans.name: Victorino

texts.es:
Victorino es un señor de 65 años de edad, vive con su esposa y un hijo  en  la localidad de la Fuente, en la provincia de Cartago.  Aquí destaca el gran  río Reventazón que es el principal sistema de drenaje de la zona   Por la fertilidad de sus suelos volcánicos y aluviales, Cartago es el centro de población que tiene en la agricultura y ganadería sus principales fuentes económicas.
Desde hace varios años  Victorino se dedica a realizar trabajos de soldadura dentro y fuera de su comunidad, con los ingresos que recibe por este trabajo colabora con los gastos del hogar. 
Actualmente Victorino  está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢1.000.000 (un millón de colones) para  comprar  herramientas de trabajo. Con esto pretende ofrecer mejores servicios a sus clientes, y aumentar sus ingresos económicos.
Victorino es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Fuente Agrícola, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Victorino is 65 years old and lives with his wife and son in Fuente, province of Cartago. Here, the great Reventazón River is the main drainage system in the area, with volcanic and alluvial soil. Cartago is the population center, and agriculture and livestock are the main sources of income. Victorino has made a living doing soldering work inside and outside his community for a number of years, and the money he earns goes toward household expenses. Currently he is requesting a loan to purchase work tools so he can offer a better service to his customers and increase his income. Victorino is a member of Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Fuente Agrícola, one of the 150 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: to purchase a soldering machine.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est mariée à un maitre maçon. Elle a 41ans et a 03 enfants tous scolarisés. Le premier a 12ans et le dernier 04ans. Pour prêter main forte à son conjoint, elle vend depuis 2002 des produits d’alimentation générale à toutes personnes dans une boutique. Son approvisionnement se fait à Lomé et elle rencontre par moment de la concurrence sur le marché. Afin de pallier à ce problème elle sollicite un second crédit dans notre institution pour acheter des produits de premières nécessités (riz, huile végétale, sucre, lait). Avec les profits supplémentaires, elle souhaite agrandir son activité tout en prenant soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is married to a master bricklayer.  She is 41 years old and has three children who all attend school.  Her oldest child is 12 and the youngest is 4.

In order to help her husband, she has been selling general food products in a shop, since 2002.  Her customers come from all walks of life.  

Akossiwa buys her supplies in Lomé.   She sometimes has to face competition on the market; this is why she is requesting a second loan from our institution.  This new loan will help her to buy staple food products such as rice, vegetable oil, sugar and milk.

With the additional profits that she will make, she would like to expand her activity, while taking care of her family.

loans.use: to buy general food products

loans.name: Marhamat

texts.ru: Квартира, где живет Мархамат, не отвечает стандартам жилья и она срочно должна отремонтировать свою квартиру. Ей 48 лет, она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Они учатся в средней школе и всегда просят родителей отремонтировать их квартиру, но ее доход от шитья одеяло и доход мужа не достаточно для этого. Ее муж работает бухгалтером и получает маленькую зарплату. Из-за не удобства дома, у детей всегда насморк зимой. Мархамат запрашивает кредит на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Мархамат и ее дети будут ждать, пока добрые кредиторы помогут им решить проблему жилья.
texts.en:
Marhamat is 48 years old, married and is raising 4 children who are studying in high school. 

The apartment where Marhamat lives does not meet housing standards and she must carry out repairs immediately. Because of these substandard conditions, her children constantly have colds in the wintertime, and they always ask their parents to fix their flat. However, Marhamat cannot afford to do so since she does not make enough money by sewing blankets, and her husband, a bookkeeper, also earns a low salary. 

Marhamat is seeking a loan in the amount of 2000 Tajikistan Somoni in order to buy building materials. Marhamat and her children are hoping that good-hearted Kiva lenders will help them to resolve their housing problem.

loans.use: To buy building materials for apartment repair

loans.name: Hingri

texts.es:
Hingri  es una mujer de 43 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos ( estudiantes todos)  en una comunidad llamada Upala que pertenece a la provincia de Alajuela, localidad que se caracteriza por sus parques nacionales, su extensa variedad de flora y  fauna y por tener un clima muy caluroso, lo que permite la producción de ciertas frutas que se desarrollan con más  fuerza en este tipo de  clima, como el mango, el melón entre otros .
Ella se dedica a la producción de plátano verde que vende en los centros de acopio locales y a otros consumidores del mercado local. Con este oficio ha sacado adelante a su familia , ella necesita ampliar la producción del producto  y para ello solicita un crédito de un millón cuarenta mil  colones exactos (¢1.040.000), con eso comprará semilla, insumos para mantenimiento del producto , preparación del terreno y otros gastos relacionados con el proyecto de siembra .
Hingri pertenece a  la Empresa de Crédito Femenina Cantonal de Upala S.A, con este crédito saldrá adelante económicamente y además manifiesta estar  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que ésta le brinda ya que así podrá llevar a cabo los proyectos que se ha propuesto.
texts.en: Hingri is 43 years old and lives with her three children (all students) in a community called Upala in the province of Alajuela, Costa Rica. The area is known for its national parks, its extensive variety of flora and fauna, and for having a very hot climate good for producing certain fruits like mangoes and melons, among others. Hingri makes a living growing green bananas, which she sells at local collection centers and to other buyers at the local market. With this work she has been able to make headway for her family. She needs to expand her production and is requesting a loan to purchase seeds and supplies to grow her product and prepare the land, as well as cover other expenses related to the planting. Hingri belongs to the Empresa de Crédito Femenina Cantonal de Upala S.A community bank, and with this loan she will gain ground financially, and she says that she is very grateful for the opportunity to have access to credit so she can take on the projects she has proposed.

loans.use: to purchase banana seeds and supplies to work the land.

loans.name: Lilliam

texts.es:
Lilliam  es una mujer de 65 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en una comunidad llamada Upala que pertenece a la provincia de Alajuela, localidad que se caracteriza por sus parques nacionales, su extensa variedad de flora y  fauna y por tener un clima muy caluroso, lo que permite la producción de ciertas frutas que se desarrollan con más  fuerza en este tipo de  clima, como el mango, el melón entre otros.
Doña Lilliam  tiene vivienda propia pero está en mal estado, necesita reparar paredes, pisos y aceras, ya que estamos en época de lluvia y se filtra el agua dentro de su casa.     
Lilliam  está solicitando un crédito de ochocientos mil colones exactos (¢800.000) para comprar materiales de construcción , como zinc, madera, cemento, y otros.
Lilliam  es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Femenina Cantonal de Upala S.A, este será su tercer  préstamo,  razón por la cual está  muy agradecida por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que ésta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en: Lilliam is 65 years old and lives with her children in a community called Upala, which is in the province of Alajuela, Costa Rica. The area is known for its national parks, its extensive variety of flora and fauna, and for having a very warm climate good for growing certain fruits like mangoes and melons, among others. Lilliam has her own home, but it is in bad condition. She needs to repair the walls, floors and pavement, since it is the rainy season and the water seeps into her home. She is requesting the loan to purchase construction materials, like zinc, wood, cement and other items. She is a member of Empresa de Crédito Femenina Cantonal de Upala S.A community bank, and this will be her third loan cycle, which is why she is very grateful to have access to the credit you are providing so she can take on her life's projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies to repair her home.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna is 60 years old and is married with four adult children. She runs a restaurant where she sells prepared food such as meatballs, soup, and other dishes to the community. Myrna has been in this business for 20 years. Myrna is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to buy meat and vegetables to prepare dishes to sell in her restaurant. In the future, she hopes that her business will expand and continue to support the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy meat and vegetables to prepare food

loans.name: Amridin

texts.ru:
Амридин родился в 1986 году в городе Вахдат. Он женат, у него двое детей. Уже три года, как Амридин занимается предоставлением услуг. Он работает таксистом. Амридин хотел бы купить новую машину и тем самым улучшить процесс своей работы. Для реализации своей цели, он обратился за кредитом. 
Амридин просит кредит для приобретения легкового автомобиля.
texts.en:
Amridin was born in 1986 in Vahdat, Tajikistan. He is married and has two children.

For the past three years, Amridin has been working in the service sector. He is a taxi driver. Amridin would like to purchase a new vehicle which would improve his working process. 

In order to realize his goal, Amridin is seeking a loan. He wants to buy a passenger car.

loans.use: to purchase a passenger car

loans.name: Elizalde

texts.en:
Elizalde is 41 years old and a hardworking husband and father. He is raising two children and is currently studying. He has been involved in the transportation business for over eight years. He travels from Lallo to Aparri and vice versa. He wants to promote their lives through this source of income. He wakes up as early as 4 o'clock in the morning in order to check and maintain his jeep to avoid inconvenience to passengers. 


Now he is requesting a loan in the amount of 15,000 php to maintain his jeep and to buy new tires. These are very important to develop his income and his business.  He will be very happy if his requested loan is approved.

loans.use: to maintain his jeep and to buy new tires

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla considers her family as a treasure that she needs to keep and take care of. She is engaged in the hog-raising business, for she believes that in this way she can support the needs of her family especially in sending her children to school.

She is 39 years old and has three children. Her husband is working as a farmer and they are helping one another to meet the needs of their family. She is not able to send two of her children to high school due to lack of financial resources. Fortunately, she learned about Kiva lenders who can provide her with business capital. At the moment she is asking if she can borrow PHP 20,000 for her hog-raising business. She hopes that her business will continue to grow and that she can maintain it for the family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets for her business.

loans.name: Geline

texts.en:
Geline is from Sta. Rosa province of Isabela. She is 50 years old. Geline is married and has three adult-aged children. To make a living, Geline owns and operates a business venture in the retail sector running a general store. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling rice in the local community. 

Geline joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Geline is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional products such as drinks, snacks and canned-goods for her store to sustain the needs of her family. In the future, Geline hopes that her business will expand so it can support all the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Lor

texts.en:
Lor is from Kampong Chhnang province, whose inhabitants are recognized as being skilled in making items from clay and which is also well-known as a geographical area. Lor is 34 years old, married, and has four children who all are at school and are under her care. Lor grows and harvests rice on her own farmland especially during the rainy season. In addition, Lor works as a sewing staff for a local garment factory in the dry season. Lor’s husband supports the family financially from his fishing activities. Together, this couple can generate an income in the neighborhood of 7.33 USD each day.

Due to the fact that the materials they use in the fishing business are old and ruined, Lor would like to take a loan to purchase new fishing materials such as various kinds of gill nets, lines and hooks. Also, she will add a portion of the loan to her savings to purchase a motorcycle for home use transportation as well as to support their businesses. In the future, Lor plans to have extensive farmland for farming rice.

loans.use: to purchase new fishing materials such as various kinds of gill nets, lines and hooks.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.en:
Graciela is 50 years old, married, and peacefully living with her spouse and children at Libag Sur. She has a small hog-raising business and income from the business has been very helpful in giving sustenance to her family. Now, she is asking for additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy medicines and feed to ensure sustainability of her hogs. With enough sustenance, the hogs will grow healthier and she can sell them for a good profit.
