Someday, Graciela hopes to keep improving her hog sales so she can earn funds to use for the family's emergencies.

loans.use: to buy medicines and hog feed.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina is 54 years old and resides at Libag Sur, with her spouse. They had four children and luckily, all of them have their own employment already. Catalina has no other source of income so she still pursues her small hog-raising business. She raise hogs and sells them to butchers upon maturity. She usually gets PHP 3,000 from each hog she sells. Income from her business will help sustain their needs so she will not only rely on her children's remittances. 

Catalina is now asking for a loan of PHP 17,000 to add to her capital so she can buy feed, medicines and vaccines so her hogs are sustainable. She would like to keep ensuring good nutrition for her hogs to ensure the overall development of her business and for their living condition as well.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines and vaccines for her hogs.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is from Sta. Rosa. She is 50 years old. Marilyn is married and has three adult children. Marilyn owns and operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising livestock. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from raising pigs for fattening and sale in the future. Marilyn has been engaged in her business for over 30 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

Marilyn is asking for a loan of PHP 24,000 to buy additional piglets to raise and sell in the future so that she can give her family a good quality of living.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Dulcita

texts.en:
Dulcita is a micro-finance member of PMPC. She is 49 years of age, married, with six school-aged children. She is residing in Bitaug, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. Her primary activity is making snacks for sale, which she has been doing for ten years getting a monthly income of PHP 2,000. Her husband engages in fishing activities. 

She took a loan from PMPC to purchase additional raw materials to make snacks, and to purchase hooks and ties to support her husband's fishing activity. She plans to use the profit and her husbands income to support the basic needs of the family and educate their children.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make snacks, and hooks and ties for fishing.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина родилась в 1991 года. Она очень умная и трудолюбивая девушка. Мадина окончила школу с хорошими оценками. Данное время она является студенткой 1 курса Худжандского Государственного Университета,  факультета Финансы и кредит. Мадина успешно учится в университете. В свободное время читает разные книги, а также после занятий она работает оператором в компьютерном центре. Мадина мечтает быть хорошим финансистом после окончания университета, но зарплата родителей не хватает для оплаты ее учебы в университете. Она запрашивает кредит для оплаты учебы. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Madina was born in 1991. She is a very intelligent and hard-working young woman. Madina graduated from high school with good grades and is presently a first-year student in the faculty of Finances and Loans at the Khujand State University. Her studies are progressing successfully. In her free time, Madina reads various books, while after classes she works as an operator in a computer centre. Madina dreams of becoming a good economist after graduating from university, but presently her parens' salaries are insufficient to cover her tuition. Therefore, Madina is requesting a loan to pay for her education. She is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her university education

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is 49 years old and married. For the past 11 years, she has operated a retail shop where she sells a variety of products such as toothpaste, soap, and condiments. Visitacion earns about 3,000 PHP monthly. 

Visitacion is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan to purchase additional products to offer the community in her store. In the future, she hopes that her general store will someday become a grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase toothpaste, soap, and condiments for her store.

loans.name: Blenda

texts.en:
Blenda is from the village of Sta. Rosa in the province of Isabela. She is 43 years old. Blenda is married and has two school-aged children. Blenda owns a general store. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling a variety of different products in the local community like drinks, snacks and spices. Blenda has been engaged in her business for over four years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Blenda is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional products such as drinks, snacks and spices for her store. Blenda wishes that her business will expand so that she can sustain the needs of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is from the town of Sta. Rosa province of Isabela. She is 39 years old. Joan is married and has three school-aged children. Joan operates a business venture in the retail sector running a clothing business. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from providing general clothing services to local community members. Joan has been engaged in her business for over ten years and earns 5,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

Joan joined ASKI to improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Her previous loan was invested in expanding the business. Joan is requesting a new loan of 13,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional clothing materials to sell.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothing materials to sell.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is 57 years old and blessed with four children. To make living, she sells wood and coconuts. She has been in this business for seven years. She is patiently developing this source of income because it is a great help in supporting the family. Despite her age, she has still the strong body to do this job. Her dream of achieving a better standard of living makes her stronger.

To further meet her dream, she is asking for a loan amount of PHP 10,000 to buy fruits and coconuts as additional goods to offer for sale. This would provide her with a higher income.

loans.use: to buy fruits and coconuts to sell.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is from mountainous Villaluz. She is 30 years old. Jennifer is married and has two school-aged children. To make a living, Jennifer runs a general store. The main source of income for the business comes from selling a variety of different products in the local community. Jennifer is just starting this business. 

Jennifer is asking for a loan of PHP 18,000 to improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She will use the loan to purchase additional products to sell to sustain the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell like spices and canned goods.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 31 years old, and is married with one child. She lives in the village of Villa Luna. To make a living, Imelda provides motorcycle transport services to local community members. She has been engaged in her business for seven years and earns approximately 300 PHP daily. 

Right now, Imelda is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase wheels, sprockets and gasoline for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.use: to purchase wheels, sprockets and gasoline for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Sidi

texts.en: Sidi is taking out another loan for the amount of KES 40,000 so as to expand the existing business. Thanks to the previous loan, she was able to add a stock of merchandise to her shop. With this loan, she will also increase her inventory by purchasing things like bread, sugar, tea leaves, flour, and other basic items. Sidi is very thankful for the opportunity given which she hopes will allow her to continue to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase bread, sugar, tea leaves, flour, and other basic items.

loans.name: Dorjpalam

texts.en:
Dorjpalam is a 57-year-old man who lives with his family in the outer ger district, which lacks basic infrastructure, of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. He has worked at a local combine, then he ran a micro-bus for a local area of the city, after that he worked at the biggest outdoor market of Mongolia.  

Currently his family lives in a yurt, a traditional Mongolian felt tent. During the winter season it’s really difficult to live in a yurt, as the temperature goes below minus 25-30 degrees. So he decided to build a small house for his family with the support of Kiva funding. He couldn’t finish the house before the winter, but he desires to do fundamental work on his housing, then next spring he will finish. He is very hardworking and reliable client of our NBFI.

loans.use: to do fundamental work on his housing.

loans.name: Sin

texts.en:
Sin, aged 29, focuses on a rice-farming business to provide income. She has been doing this for 11 years. Also, Sin is skilled in making various kinds of containers from strips of wood woven together. From this business, Sin can generate an income of 10,000 KHR each day, which goes on their daily sustenance. At present, Sin is responsible for five single children, some of whom are already enrolled in school.

Sin would like to purchase a piece of land from her neighbor for housing purposes in the future, so she is asking for a loan of 2,000,000 KHR from HKL and Kiva. She anticipates having a nice house which provides her family with a comfortable living standard.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land from her neighbor for housing purposes.

loans.name: Liziko

texts.en:
Liziko is from a small village of Kareli district. She is 51 years old, married, and lives with her parents-in-law. Her parents-in-law have a retirement pension. Liziko's husband has a tractor and provides seasonal agricultural services to local farmers and gets a service fee for the work. The main source of income for the family is the agricultural business. In particular, they have a plot of land, which is cultivated and they grow different kinds of fruits and vegetables, such as tomatoes, cabbages, beets, haricots, onions and apples. Liziko sells her agricultural production locally.

She requested a loan to purchase cattle. She will buy three milk cows and be able to sell dairy products. Liziko hopes her business will generate a higher income. This will give her an opportunity to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en: Nenita, age 50, sells a variety of different products in her local general store. She has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month. She and her husband have three adult children and live in the village of Cabaruan. Her goal is to help improve her living situation and increase her ability to engage in business activities. The previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Nenita is requesting a new loan of 9,000 PHP, which will also be used to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Gowa

texts.en: Gowa lives in her own house with her spouse; she has eight children five of whom are in school. She has a charcoal store at the market. She comments that thanks to the loan she will able to stay in businesses and continue to have income-generating work. The requested loan will be used to buy sacks of charcoal to sell, and will, therefore, allow her to continue to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en: Amalia is 44 years old and married. Her spouse helps her with her grocery store business. They both wake up early to prepare the store for their customers. Amalia is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP, which she will use to buy additional products that she can offer to her customers. Amalia hopes that her business expands so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: To purchase beverages, rice, snack food, and fruits for her store.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is engaged in a hog-raising business in the village of Villa Luna. She is 53 years old and is married. They are blessed with three children. 

Maria works hard to support their daily needs and to help her children financially. She wants to develop her business and increase her income. 

To this end, Maria wants to borrow a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy feed and vaccines for her hog. She is hoping that her loan request will be granted so she can develop her business and purchase more hogs to raise.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hog

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is a micro-finance member of PMPC. She is 51 years old and married with one school-age child.  

She has raised livestock as a primary source of income for a period of 15 years, with average monthly earnings of PHP 3,000. 

She took out a loan from PMPC to purchase a cow to raise and sell in the future. The income she earns from raising livestock shall be used to cover the educational expenses of her child.

loans.use: to purchase an additional cow to raise

loans.name: Khuon

texts.en:
Khuon is 60 years old and a responsible father of five children. He resides in Kampong Chhnang province. 

He is a farmer who grows and harvests rice to sell. He has been in this business for over 30 years. Khuon is proud that his experience and farming practices allow him to continually develop his farming business. Khuon’s wife is skilled at weaving bamboos baskets, which she then supplies to the marketplaces.

Since rice farming is quite a hard work, Khuon needs a few laborers to help him work in the rice field. Because of a lack of capital, he has applied for a loan of 700,000 KHR to pay for labor costs incurred in harvesting his rice. 

He hopes that his business will improve and that he will be able to experience a better living standard someday through his effort, patience and sacrifices.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs incurred in harvesting his rice.

loans.name: Narantuya

texts.en:
Narantuya is a 48-year-old, married woman who lives with her husband and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her family does not own their own apartment yet, but they have a mortgage from another bank to eventually own it. 

Narantuya has been supporting her family by operating a beauty salon for 13 years. Previously, her youngest daughter helped her mother at the salon by giving manicures and pedicures. Narantuya’s salon offers body and head massages, facial treatments and eyebrow tattoos. 

She is a much trusted repeat client of our institution and this loan will be used to purchase a variety of cosmetic goods.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of cosmetic products

loans.name: Koami

texts.fr: Père de 02 enfants, Mr Koami âgé de 36ans est marié à une revendeuse de pagnes. Ses deux enfants sont tous sur les bancs de l’école et ils sont âgés de 19 et 15ans.  Pour bien jouer son rôle de père de famille, il vend dans une boutique des pièces détachées depuis 2008 et est aidé par 01 personne. Il s’approvisionne chez les grossistes au grand marché de Lomé. Son stock s’épuise et il veut le renouveler c’est pour cela, il sollicite de WAGES un second prêt pour acheter plus de marchandises (des pièces détachées pour véhicules).  Il veut diversifier la marchandise et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Koami is a 36-year-old father of two children, and is married to a woman who works reselling “pagnes” [traditional wrap-around cloth]. Both of his children are at school, and are 19 and 15 years of age. To make sure that he is a good father to his family, Koami works selling spare parts in a store, where he is helped by one other person. He has done this since 2008. 

Koami gets his supplies from wholesalers in the Grand Market of Lomé. He has run out of stock, and wants to replace it, so has requested a second loan from WAGES to purchase more merchandise (vehicle spare parts). Koami wants to diversify his merchandise, as well as to provide for his family’s basic needs.

loans.use: To buy spare parts.

loans.name: Mavzunakhon

texts.ru: Мавзунахон родилась в 1977 году. Она с детства отличалась от других детей своими подвигами и поступками. Данный момент она разведена и воспитывает сына одна. Мавзунахон работает в музее и ее зарплата не хватает для обеспечения сына со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Ее сын окончил школу с хорошими оценками и поступил в университет. Мавзунахон должна оплатить за учебу сына, но у нее нет денег. Она запрашивает кредит для оплаты обучения сына и надеется только на вас. Давайте, поможем ей осуществить ее мечту дать сыну высшее образование!
texts.en: Mavzunakhon was born in 1977. Even as a child, she was different from other kids in her deeds and exploits. Presently, Mavzunakhon is divorced and is raising her son by herself. She works at a museum, but her salary is insufficient to provide her son with all necessities of life. Mavzunakhon's son has graduated from high school with good grades and entered university. His mother needs to pay for his education but has no money. She is requesting a loan to pay her son's tuition, and you are her only hope. Together, let us help Mavzunakhon realize her dream and provide higher education to her son!

loans.use: to pay for her son’s university education

loans.name: Toudjani

texts.fr: Toudjani vit avec son mari tailleur et leurs 03 enfants à Lomé. Les enfants sont tous sur les bancs de l’école et ils sont âgés de 19, 15 et 09ans. Elle est revendeuse de profession. C’est depuis 2002 qu’elle a démarré cette activité et cela lui procure des revenus lui permettant de se prendre en charge et d’assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille. Pour l’avancement de son activité, une personne l’aide. Son premier crédit qu’elle sollicite chez nous lui servira d’acheter des produits de premières nécessités. Avec les profits, elle veut ouvrir une boutique vu qu’elle expose ses produits sur étalage et assurer de plus en plus les besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Toudjani lives with her tailor husband and their three children in Lomé. All of their children are at school, and are 19, 15 and 9 years of age. 

Toudjani has worked as a reseller since 2002, and her business provides her with income that allows her to provide for her family’s basic needs. One person helps her in her business. This is the first loan she has requested from this institution, and she will use it to buy basic essential items. Toudjani plans to use her profits to open a store, where she will display her products on shelves, as well as to provide for her family even more.

loans.use: To buy general food products.

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Femme d’un employé dans une société de la place, Madame Amélé âgée de 38ans à 01 enfant scolarisé de 13ans. Elle est revendeuse de profession et vend des œufs de façon ambulante à ses clients de parts et d’autres de la ville de Lomé. Un membre de la famille l’aide dans l’exécution de ses taches. Pour renforcer son activité, elle sollicite un premier prêt à WAGES pour acheter des œufs. Elle veut avoir une boutique pour éviter de se promener et  voir son enfant faire de longues études.
texts.en:
Amélé is married to an employee of a local business, and is 38 years of age. She has one 13-year-old child, who goes to school. 

Amélé works as a street vendor reselling eggs, and her customers are from the city of Lomé and elsewhere.  One of the members of her family helps her with her business. To consolidate her business, Amélé has requested her first loan from WAGES, which she will use to buy eggs. She plans to have a store so that she no longer has to work in the street, and also hopes to see her child study for a long time.

loans.use: To buy fresh eggs.

loans.name: Eméka

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 32ans, Eméka est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants en charge. Il est revendeur de pièces détachées depuis 2009 et vend ses produits dans une boutique. Il est souvent confronté aux problèmes de la concurrence et pour pallier à cela, il sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt  pour s’approvisionner en marchandises pour pouvoir garder sa clientèle. Il voudrait agrandir l’activité et se marier plus tard.
texts.en:
Eméka is a young, single, 32-year-old man who has no children under his care. He works reselling spare parts in a store, and has done so since 2009.

Eméka often faces problems due to competition, and to offset this he has requested a first loan from WAGES. He plans to use this loan to buy supplies of merchandise, so that he can keep his customers. He would like to expand his business, and also hopes to get married in the future.

loans.use: To buy spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tomatoes, cabbage, potatoes, chiles, onions, carrots and more vegetables as well as 5 bags of corn for her family's consumption.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn is married with four children. She sells fruit and vegetables to the people in her community. She is a happy, very generous and very humble person in the community, so villagers also reciprocate as they do business with her. She is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy a variety of fruit and vegetables to sell in their small store. She hopes to have more income to provide for the needs of her family. Someday, their living will be improved by her loan and hard work.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is 26 years old. She lives with her husband, who is an employee in a butcher shop and they do not have any children yet. 

Mwanasha has a business operating a food stall.  In addition, she owns a kiosk selling a variety of basic products. She is applying for a loan to  buy a larger quantity of merchandise, increasing the quantity of inventory and also renovating her business premises.  This idea fills her with much excitement, because she hopes to improve her earnings and in this way continue offering support to her husband.  Mwanasha will be able to buy wheat and maize flour, rice, detergent, etc.

loans.use: to buy wheat and maize flour, rice, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en: Vilma is 37 years old, and is married. Vilma operates a small store in which she offers different kinds of basic commodities. She just started this business in the last three years. She lives with her family in the village of Villa Luna.  Her place is far from the market and relies more on agricultural business. She would like to buy more groceries that are needed in her village. But due to insufficient funds, Vilma is motivated to borrow additional capital in the amount of 17,000 Philippine pesos to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted breads and eggs to sell. She hopes to obtain the requested loan amount in order to increase her profits, which will serve her children's education and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted breads and eggs to sell

loans.name: La Maquina Del Esfuerzo Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “La maquina el Esfuerzo” está conformado por 16  emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; bazar, venta de bolsos, pastelería, articulos de cumpleaños y bautizo, articulos de bebes, lencería, peluquería, venta de empanadas, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de San Bernardo, ubicada en la ciudad de Santiago.
Nelly secretaria del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie, ocupando el primer lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste una polera de color azul y encima lleva un chaleco de color lila, su cabello es de color oscuro y lo usa tomado.
Ella se dedica al rubro de venta de Berlines (Los Berlines es un dulce Chileno muy vendido en invierno, son rellenos con crema pastelera, manjar y mermelada, es una masa esponjosa frita en aceite o al horno), desde hace 2 años. Comenta que trabaja vendiendo sus berlines en la feria los días sábado y domingo, junto con su marido, y su horario de trabajo lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
La mercadería la compra en una panadería donde compra los berlines por mayor, tiene la posibilidad de comprarlos a bajo costo ya que la conocen y por lo tanto es conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará solo berlines para abastecer su negocio.
Una de las metas de Nelly son tener un local estable en la feria y poder vender juguetes y ofrece sus berlines mas cómodamente a su clientela,  para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Nelly vive junto a su esposo, y sus cuatro hijos de 15, 11, 6 y 4 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel laboral y familiar son seguir creciendo día a día, lograr tener más ingresos para darle lo mejor a sus hijos en los estudios.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Comenta que las capacitaciones han sido fundamentales para su negocio y también para su desarrollo personal, ya que ha aprendido a organizar y distribuir de mejor manera sus ingresos e inversiones.
San Bernardo es una ciudad, ubicada  a 18 km. en línea recta hacia el sur desde la plaza de armas de Santiago (capital de Chile). Es conocida como la capital del folklore, debido a que cada año, en  enero, se realiza el "Festival Internacional del Folklore", un evento en el que las raíces del país se dan cita y se reúnen  agrupaciones musicales de toda Sudamérica. También se desarrolla la "Feria de Artesanía Tradicional", en la que participan tanto artesanos chilenos como de otros países cercanos. Luego en abril se realiza el  evento “Abril cuecas Mil” que consiste en hacer bailar cueca (baile tradicional chileno) a toda la comuna.
texts.en:
“La maquina del Esfuerzo” (The Efforts Machine) is a Communal Bank composed of 16 entrepreneurs who engage in different activities, such as running a bazaar, selling bangs, running a cake shop, selling birthday and christening items, selling products for babies, selling lingerie, running a hairdresser’s shop, selling empanadas (meat pies) and providing general services. They all live in the community of San Bernardo, located in the town of Santiago.
Nelly is the secretary of the Communal Bank; in the picture she is the first person standing from left to right, she wears a light blue T-shirt and a lilac vest and she wears her dark hair down.
Nelly has been selling berlines for 2 years (berlines are a Chilean doughnuts sold especially during the winter, consisting in a spongy dough fried in oil or cooked in the oven and filled with custard cream, dulce de leche and jam). She says she sells her doughnuts in the fair on Saturdays and Sunday, working together with her husband and setting their working hours according to her availability.
She buys the doughnuts in a bakery that sells them at wholesale prices: it is economically good for her as she can profit from their low prices because she is known in the bakery.
The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of doughnuts to stock up her inventory.
One of Nelly’s dreams is to own an established locale in the fair where to sell toys as well as her doughnuts in a more comfortable environment for her customers; this would help her increase her income in order to reach a better standard of living.
Nelly lives with her husband and their four children aged 15, 11, 6 and 4. Her personal and professional dreams include keeping on progressing on a daily basis and succeeding in earning a better income in order to offer the best to her children and to pay for their education.
She is very happy about and feels deeply grateful to the chance she has been offered by Fondo Esperanza as this will allow her in to invest in her activity. She says that the seminars have been crucial both for her activity and for her personal growth, as she has learned how to better organize and distribute her income and investments.
San Bernardo is a city that is located 18 kilometers due south from the Plaza de Armas in Santiago (the Chilean capital). It is known as the folklore capital since the International Folklore Festival is held there every January. This event highlights the various ethnic groups of the country and musical groups from all over South America gather there. Chilean artisans, as well as those from other countries nearby, also participate in the Traditional Craft Fair. In the month of April, an event called "Abril Cuecas Mil" celebrates the "cueca" (a traditional Chilean dance) throughout the entire community.

loans.use: To buy doughnuts to stock up her inventory.

loans.name: Bolormaa

texts.en:
Bolormaa is 49 years old  and the mother of three children.  She lives in a suburb of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. Her spouse works in Korea by governmental labor contract.  In 2011, Bolormaa operated a grocery store but her mother became very sick and she stopped her business for a while.  

Now her mother feels better, so she wants to operate her business again as well as looking after her mom.  Bolormaa is seeking a Kiva loan to start her small grocery store business again.  Her elder son attends college and her other son and daughter attend high school, and her sons will help to her to operate her business until their dad back.

loans.use: to start her grocery business again

loans.name: Somialo

texts.fr: Madame Somialo vit avec son conjoint chauffeur et leurs 02 enfants à Lomé. L’ainé âgé de 08 ans fréquente et le dernier quant à lui âgé de 03 ans ne va pas encore à l‘école. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle vend des galettes depuis 2009 à la devanture de sa maison.  Elle voudrait assurer l’éducation de ses enfants, agrandir son activité c’est pour cela, elle sollicite dans notre institution un premier prêt pour acheter des matières premières(farine de blé et de l’huile) pour préparer des galettes, tirer plus de profit afin d’atteindre ses objectifs.
texts.en:
Somialo lives with her spouse (who works as a driver) and their two children in Lomé. Their oldest child, who is 8 years of age, goes to school, and the youngest (who is 3) does not yet go to school. To help her husband with the household expenses, Somialo has worked selling cookies outside her house since 2009. 

As she would like to provide for her children’s education and expand her business, Somialo has requested her first loan from WAGES. She plans to use it to buy raw materials (wheat flour and oil) to make cookies, generate more profit, and meet her goals.

loans.use: To buy wheat flour and vegetable oil.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre de 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y sus 2 hijos, a quienes a quienes ama y son su razón principal en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar la carrera miliar que tanto deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver noticieros y programas informativos en televisión, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso arroz chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Carlos trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, todas las mañanas desde tempranas horas inicia su labor, él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda pasajeros, adicionalmente él cuenta con un pequeño camión el cual alquila para transporte, Carlos puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes y así también porque conoce las zonas donde encontrar mayor cantidad de pasajeros.
Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y el pintado de su camión; de esta manera Carlos contará con su vehículo en buenas condiciones para poder seguir trabajando e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para  que poco a poco pueda iniciar su propia empresa de transporte y así espera lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 44 year old man. He lives in the city with his spouse and 2 children, whom he loves and who are his main reason for living. He is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person who puts all of his efforts into getting his family ahead. Lamentably, because he had to work to pay for expenses he was unable to study for the military career he wanted so much, but he would have really liked to have done so. In his free time, he likes to watch the news and informative programs on television. Sometimes he cooks a delicious fried rice to share with his family. 

With much hard work and enthusiasm, Carlos works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He starts working very early every morning. He goes through the streets of his city looking for passengers. He also has a small truck which he rents out for transport. Carlos can work approximately 10 hours a day and he thinks it is going well for him because of the friendly traetment he offers his customers and also because he knows the areas where he can find the most passengers.

Carlos is very grateful  to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he can put in replacement parts and paint his truck. Thtis way, Carlos will keep his vehicle in good condition so he can keep working and increase his income. This will be very useful to him so that little by little he can start his own transportation business. In the long term, he hopes to acheieve his biggest dream, seeing his children have good careers and become good men.

loans.use: to put in some replacement parts and paint his truck.

loans.name: Florinda Arely

texts.es:
Florinda tiene 25 años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija. Tiene ocho años de trabajar como cocinera, aprendió por iniciativa propia; antes solo se dedicaba a ayudar a su mamá con los oficios de la casa. Se desplaza a pie caminando durante cinco minutos por un callejón, luego aborda un autobús, hasta llegar al lugar donde compra toda la mercadería que necesita. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar electrodomésticos para el hogar, debido a que recientemente termino de construir su casa, para independizarse de sus padres. Con el préstamo, ella dispondrá de lo necesario para realizar sus oficios más rápidos; además que los electrodomésticos le duraran por mucho tiempo. Pues, por si sola le es muy difícil ahorrar para adquirirlos. Su deseo es mejorar su vivienda, ya que la construyo de varas y las paredes son de carpetas.
texts.en:
Florinda is 25 years old. She is the single mother of a daugter. She has been working as a cook for eight years. She learned how to do this on her own intiative. Previously she helped her mother with the housework. She goes to work by walking five minutes down an alleyway and then taking a bus until she arrives at the place where she buys all the merchandise she needs.

The loan she is asking for is to buy applicances for the home. Recently, she finished building her home to become independent from her parents. With the loan, she will have what she needs to do her job more quickly, and the appliances will last her a long time. On her own it would be very difficult for her to save to acquire them. Her wish is to improve her home, since it was built with rods and the walls are made from siding.

loans.use: to buy appliances for the home.

loans.name: Guadalupe Lucia

texts.es:
La señora Guadalupe Lucia esta casada, tiene 28 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos losa cuales aun no están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició este trabajo siendo operaria para otro negocio, y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de sus esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de tramos de hilos para tejer cortes e hilos de diferente clases y colores,, espera tener una buena ganancia de la inversión que esta haciendo.
texts.en:
Sra. Guadalupe Lucia is married, 28 years old and has completed three years of primary school education. She has two children who are not yet in school. She is a weaver and started by first working for another business. She has had three years of experience up to now and has the support of her husband, who is a trader. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase lengths of thread to weave traditional skirts and will buy different kinds and colors of thread. She expects to make a good profit on the investment she is making.

loans.use: to purchase threads to weave traditional skirts.

loans.name: Téné

texts.fr: Mère de famille, madame Téné est mariée à un chauffeur. Elle exerce comme activité la vente des sachets plastiques dans un marché de la place. Confrontée aux problèmes de rupture de stock par moment, elle sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour augmenter son stock de marchandises. Avec les profits, elle veut assurer l’épanouissement de la famille et ajouter d’autres activités.
texts.en:
Téné is a married mother, and her husband is a driver. She works selling plastic bags in a local market.

As she is currently facing stock shortage problems, Téné has requested her first loan from WAGES to increase her stock of merchandise. She uses her profits to ensure that her family get ahead, as well as to add other businesses.

loans.use: To buy plastic bags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy crates of drinks.

loans.name: Abunzubumwe / Bnyrl Group

texts.fr:
Théogène fait partie du groupe Abunzubumwe / Bnrl. Le nom du groupe signifie «union du groupe».Il a 27 et il est marié avec 5 enfants de 2 à 11 ans, dont 2 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Théogène est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz et payement de main d’œuvre. 

Pour faire croitre son agriculture des riz, il planifie de demander d’autres crédit pour renforcer son agriculture. Dans les prochaines années, Théogène voudrait être le meilleur cultivateur de riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’acheter une vache de race améliore.
texts.en:
Théogène is part of the Abunzubumwe/Bnrl group, the name of which means “group union”. He is 27 years of age, married, and has five children aged between 2 and 11, two of whom are at school. He studied six years of elementary school education.

Théogène works as a rice grower, and this is his first loan cycle with ACB. He plans to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice-growing business, as well as to pay labor expenses. To expand his rice business, Théogène plans to request further loans to strengthen his business. Over the coming years, he would like to become the best rice grower in his region, and he plans to use his profits to buy an improved breed of cow.

loans.use: To buy chemical fertilizers for his rice-growing business, as well as to pay labor expenses.

loans.name: Magdaleno

texts.es:
Magdaleno tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería desde hace ocho años aproximadamente. Fue por iniciativa propia que aprendió el oficio; antes era empleado. Los insumos agrícolas, los compra en una ciudad que esta a cinco kilómetros de su casa, se desplaza en autobús que pasa frente a su casa, tarda en llegar veinte minutos al lugar donde compra los insumos. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando es para pagar el arrendamiento del lugar en donde lleva a pastorear sus animales, limpiar el terreno, compra de tratamiento veterinario y compra de forraje. Con el préstamo, dispondrá de medicinas y alimento para sus vacas, así, como de un lugar para llevarlas a pastorear; a fin de que aumenten la producción de leche y que estén gordos para venderlos a buen precio. Su deseo, es incrementar su producción de leche y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Magdaleno is 37 years old, married and has four children. He has been a farmer and livestock breeder for approximately eight years. He learned the tasks through his own initiative. Before that, he was a wage earner. He buys his agricultural supplies in a city located five kilometers from his home and travels on a bus that passes right in front of his house. It takes 20 minutes to reach the place where he buys his supplies. 

The loan he is requesting is to pay the lease on the pastures for his animals, for weeding on his land, for veterinarian care and to purchase fodder. With the loan he will provide medicine and feed for his cows as well as a place to take them to pasture so that he can increase their production of milk and fatten them in order to sell them at a good price. His wish is to increase his milk production and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to pay to lease a place where he can take his animals to pasture, for weeding his land, for veterinarian care and to purchase fodder.

loans.name: Hingabizera / Nykby Group

texts.fr:
Cyriaque fait partie du groupe Hingabizera / Nykby. Le nom du groupe signifie «union du groupe».Il a 42 et il est marié avec 5 enfants de 6 à 28 ans, dont 5 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Cyriaque est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz et payement de main d’œuvre. 

Pour faire croitre son agriculture des riz, il planifie d’utiliser des fertilisants pour augmenter la capacité des champs pour la production plus élevé de riz. Dans les prochaines années, Cyriaque voudrait être le grand cultivateur de riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de construire une belle maison.
texts.en:
Cyriaque is part of the Hingabizera/Nykby group, the name of which means "group union”. He is 42 years of age, married, and has five children aged between 6 and 28, all of whom are at school. He studied six years of elementary school education.

Cyriaque works as a rice grower, and this is his first loan cycle with ACB. He plans to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice-growing business, as well as to pay labor expenses. To expand his rice-growing business, he plans to use fertilizers to increase the capacity of his fields to ensure a greater rice harvest. Over the coming years, he would like to become the best rice grower in his region, and he plans to use his profits to build a nice house.

loans.use: To buy chemical fertilizers for his rice-growing business, as well as to pay labor expenses.

loans.name: Bonnevie Joy

texts.en:
Bonnevie Joy is 31 years old and has one child. She is an industrious mother who helps her husband earn money for their family. She has been running a vegetable-selling business for over five years. 

Bonnevie Joy now wants to sell more vegetables to increase her income but due to financial difficulties, she cannot afford to. So she is asking for a loan amount of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy carrots, squash, cabbage and okra to increase her usual sales. She will then be able to afford to finance her family's living expenses and save funds for the future of her child, which is very important to her.

loans.use: to buy carrots, squash, cabbage and okra

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en: Bonifacia is 42 years old, married, and lives in the mountainous region of Isabela in the Philippines. She is engaged in selling different products from her grocery store in her community. Bonifacia is a very hardworking person who does everything for her family. She is asking for a loan of 13,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to purchase different products such as spices, beverages and snacks to sell.

loans.use: to purchase different products such as spices, beverages and snacks

loans.name: Lizzeth Marisol

texts.es:
Lizzeth es una mujer de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su padres y sus 2 hermanos pequeños, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera técnica de idiomas, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia, ya que ellos son lo más importante en su vida.
 Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace un año Lizzeth trabaja como Secretaria en una la Municipalidad de su distrito, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella trabaja un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Lizzeth se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos para la tramitación y obtención de su bachillerato en la carrera de Contabilidad y para realizar la compra de sus materiales de estudio, como libros, cds y útiles de escritorio para poder cursar sus estudios de idiomas; de esta manera Lizzteh espera poder desarrollar su carrera profesional  y superarse, para que así, junto con su familia puedan salir adelante.
texts.en:
Lizzeth is a 21 year-old single woman who lives with her parents and two young brothers in the city of Cañete in Imperial district . She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Thanks to her effort and her parent’s support, she was able to study the professional career of accounting. Currently, she is also studying for a technical career in languages. 

In her spare time she enjoys sharing enjoyable moments with her family since they are the most important people in her life.

For the past year, with great dedication and hard work, Lizzeth has been working as a secretary in one of the municipalities of her district. Every day from early in the morning she starts work and works approximately 8 hours a day. She believes that she is doing well because of her good performance and because of her helpful demeanor towards others.

Lizzeth is very grateful to Kiva lender because, thanks to their help, she will be able to cover the expenses involved in processing and obtaining her BA in accounting and to purchase study materials such as books, CDs and writing materials in order to pursue her language studies. In this way Lizzeth expects to develop her professional career and succeed so that she, together with her family, can move ahead.

loans.use: to cover the cost of processing and obtaining her B.A. degree.

loans.name: Antonio Salvio

texts.es:
ANTONIO SALVIO tiene 22 años de edad es soltero tiene dos hijos de 2 años y 1 mes de edad, vive con los padres los hijos viven con la madre en la Ciudad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC BRUNIQUILDE, se encuentra ubicada en Recinto Calabi, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

ANTONIO SALVIO se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a la crianza de animales. Solicita el crédito para aplicar en la agricultura en la compra de insumos, fertilizantesm urea, abonos, líquido para convatir la s plagas.

Las compras de los productos las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas cada 15 días. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesarío para tratar la tierra y poder sembrar.

Enfrenta desfíos cómo las plagas en los cultivos el cogollero. El sueño es trabajar y superarce. En el tiempo libre le gusta dialogar con los padres y hermanos y ser cariñoso con los hijos.
texts.en:
Antonio Salvio is 22 years old, unmarried and has two children, who are 2 years old and 1 month old. He lives with his parents and the children live with their mother in the city of Ventanas in Los Rios Province.

He is a member of Bruniquilde Communal Bank, which is located in Calabi precinct, part of Ventanas canton. He is a farmer.

Antonio Salvio cultivates maize and also raises animals. He is requesting a loan to invest in farming by buying supplies, fertilizer, urea, compost and liquids to combat pests. He makes his purchase in the city of Ventanas every 15 days. With the help of the loan he will be able to buy all he needs to prepare the land and be able to plant.

He confronts challenges such as the budworm pest in his plants. His dream is to work and improve himself. In his spare time he likes to talk to his parents and siblings and be affectionate with his children.

loans.use: to invest in farming by purchasing supplies: fertilizer, urea, compost and liquids to combat pests.

loans.name: Oscar Jesus

texts.es:
OSCAR JESUS tiene 39 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene 4 hijos de 16, 17,7,4 años de edad, vive con la conyugue y con los hijos en la ciudad de Ciudad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC BRUNIQUILDE, se encuentra ubicada en Recinto Calabi, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

OSCAR JESUS se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para poder invertir en la agricultura y en la compra de insumos, fertilizantesm urea, abonos, líquido mata monte.

Las compras de los productos las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas cada semana. La ayuda del crédito le ayudará a  mejorar y superarce en lo económico.
Enfrenta desfíos cómo las plagas en los cultivos y la lancha que quema los cultivos. El sueño es trabajar en los proximos años para mejorar la condición de vida de la familia. En el tiempo libre le gusta reunirce los fines de semana en casa de los padres.
texts.en:
Oscar Jesús, 39, has a common-law marriage and has four children, ages 16, 17, 7, and 4.  He lives with his spouse and children in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  He's a member of Bruniquilde Communal Bank, located in Recinto Calabi in Ventanas Canton, where they make a living in agriculture.

Oscar Jesús works in agriculture growing corn.  He's requesting the loan to be able to invest in agriculture and in buying inputs, fertilizer, urea, and liquid weedkiller.

He will make his purchases weekly in the city of Ventanas.  The loan will help him improve and improve himself financially.

He faces challenges such as pests in his crops and the blight that burn the crops.  His dream is to work in the next few years to improve his family's living conditions.  In his free time he likes to go to his parents' house on the weekend.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Lucrecia Genoveva

texts.es:
LUCRECIA GENOVEVA tiene 26 años de edad de estado civil soltera tiene 1 hijo de 10 años de edad, vive con los padres y el hijo en la Ciudad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC BRUNIQUILDE, se encuentra ubicada en Recinto Calabi, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

LUCRECIA GENOVEVA se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantesm urea, abonos, líquido mata monte.

Las compras de los productos las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas cada 20 días. Con La ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos.
Enfrenta desfíos cómo poder superarce para el bienestar de la familia. El sueño es trabajar tener salud, vida y amor. En el tiempo libre le gusta dialogar y trabajar mucho.
texts.en:
Lucrecia Genoveva is 26 years old, she is a single mother of a 10 year old son, and she lives with her parents and her son in Ventanas, which is located in the Ríos province.

She is a member of the VRC BRUNIQUILDE, located in the Calabi precinct, which belongs to the Ventanas canton and which is an agricultural area.

Lucrecia Genoveva works in agriculture and harvests corn.  She is seeking a loan so that she can buy supplies, fertilizer, compost, and liquid weed killer.

She will buy these products in the city of Ventana every 20 days.  With the help from the loan, she will be able to buy these supplies.

She faces challenges and works for the benefit of her family.  Her dream is to work, to be healthy, to live and to love.  In her free time she likes to chat and to work.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers, compost, and liquid weed killer.

loans.name: Njira

texts.en:
Njira is 45 years old, married, and has eight children. In order to generate the income that her household needs, she has a kiosk where she sells consumer products, which she has been doing for three years. Her customers know her and her sales have been improving.

Njira is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase flour, snacks, and soda.  Thanks to this business she has been able to provide her children with a good quality of life. Nevertheless, the fact that she has supported her family has meant that financial problems persist in her household. Consequently she works hard every day with the goal of overcoming these problems.  Her greatest dream is that her children have the possibility to succeed. She aspires to be able to overcome her financial difficulties and achieve a better quality of life at home with her children.

loans.use: to purchase flour, snacks, and sodas.

loans.name: Bobonazar

texts.ru: Бобоназару 59  лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 6 детей. Уже несколько лет он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как рис, кукуруза и т.п. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Так как у него высококачественный урожай, так и его товары имеют большой спрос. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 5000 сомони, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и семена. Доход, который он будет получать от бизнеса, будет использовать для образования своих детей и улучшения условия жизни. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Bobonazar is 59 years old, married, and raising 6 children. For the past several years, he has been cultivating crops such as rice, corn etc. and selling his harvest at the market. As his produce is of top quality, it is always in high demand. Bobonazar's wife helps him with his business.

In order to provide his family with all necessities of life, Bobonazar wants to expand his business, and for that he needs to increase his harvests. He is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers and seeds. He will use his business profits to pay for his children's education and improve the quality of their life. Bobonazar needs and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Juana Consuelo

texts.es:
La señora Juana Consuelo esta casad, tiene 38 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijo 1 el cual esta estudiando, se dedica al tejido de cortes típicos, inicio este trabajo siendo empleada para otro negocio, hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo como capital de trabajo, ya que quiere comprar mas tramos de hilo e hilos para tejido de varias clases y colores, y si aumentar su producción de tejidos, los cortes que actualmente esta trabajando es el diseño Capa del Rey, espera en el futuro contar con empleados en su negocio para tener una fuente de ingresos para otras familias.
texts.en:
Juana Consuelo is married, she is 38 years old, and she completed the first 6 years of primary school.  She has one son who is a student.  She knits typical items.  She began this work as a second job while she was employed elsewhere, until the moment in which she had 20 years of experience.  She says that she has the support of her husband, who also does the same work.

She is seeking a loan so that she can use it as capital for her work.  She already wants to buy more lengths of yarn and thread so that she can knit in various colors and styles and increase the output of her knitting.  The cuts that she is making are of the Capa del Rey design.  She hopes in the future to have employees in her business so that her business will be a source of income for other families.

loans.use: to buy yarn and thread.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna has been engaged in her piggery business for twenty years. She is 55 years old and is married to Nicanor. She is thankful because her husband has been helping her to earn their living and provide the necessities for her children. Currently she is raising two piglets to whom she devotes her time. She wishes to make them healthier and nourish them well, so Myrna is asking for a loan of P15,000 to buy feed and vitamins. Hopefully, she can make her business bigger to make their lifestyle wealthier.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins

loans.name: Kaycee

texts.en:
Kaycee aims to become successful in the future. She is 24 years old. She is engaged in a hog-raising business to help her parents to generate income to satisfy their family's needs. She has been in this business for two years and usually earns profits of PHP 8,000 for every two pigs she sells. 

Kaycee planned to acquire more pigs to raise but she didn't have enough capital, therefore, she is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. She mentioned that this loan will help her to improve her business and she hopes that she will make her business grow in future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Sukhbyamba

texts.en:
Sukhbyamba is a 48-year-old married woman who has three children and lives in a small house which is located in an outer 'ger' district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia.  Her younger son attends a local institute in 4th year, so he has only one year to finish his institute. 

Sukhbyamba is requesting 3,500,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) to pay her son’s tuition fees.  She really believes and hopes that her son will become a very well educated person and will support her in the future.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fees.

loans.name: Gloria Beatriz

texts.es:
Gloria Beatriz tiene 27 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con la mamá y con  los hijos de 7 y 5 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.
Gloria se dedica a la agricultura y a la siembra de maíz, arroz hace 8 años. Las compras y las Ventas lo realiza en Ventanas y en Pueblo viejo. Solicita el crédito para trabajar en la siembra de maíz y compra de abonos agrícolas.
Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a comprar semillas. El sueño es poder tener una casa.

No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En el tiempo libre le gusta trabajar.
texts.en:
Gloria Beatriz is 27 years old, she is single, she has two children, and she lives with her mother and her two children (who are 7 and 5 years old) in the canton of Ventanas, in the province of Rios.

She is a member of the VRC Las Palmas Group, located in the Campo Alegre precinct in the canton of Bab, which is an area dedicated to agriculture.

Gloria has been working in agriculture for 8 years by planting corn and rice.  She makes her purchases and sales in Ventanas and Pueblo Viejo.  She is seeking a loan so that she can buy agricultural fertilizers for her corn crops.  With the help from this loan she will also be able to buy seeds.  Her dream is to have a house.

She doesn't have any troubles.  In her free time she likes to work.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her corn crops.

loans.name: Jorge Mateo

texts.es:
Jorge Mateo tiene 26 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 2 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

Jorge se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz hace 8 años. Las compras y las ventas lo realizan en Pueblo Viejo. Solicita el crédito para seguir trabajando en la siembra y comprar abonos agrícolas.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar semillas, el sueño es poder tener un terreno.

No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jorge Mateo is 26 years old and is married with two children.  He lives with his wife and their children, who are 4 and 2 years old, in Ventanas, which is in the Rios province.

He is a member of VRC Las Palmas, which is located in the Campo Alegre precinct in the canton of Bab, which is an agricultural area.

Jorge has worked in agriculture for 8 years, growing corn and rice.  He makes his purchases and sales in Pueblo Viejo.  He is seeking a loan so that he can continue harvesting and to buy agricultural fertilizers.

With the money from this loan, he will be able to buy seeds.  His dream is to own his own land.  In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to continue sowing and to buy agricultural fertilizers.

loans.name: Rosa Carlota

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 46 años de edad es soltera tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos de 19, 17 y 12 años de edad en el Cantón ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz hace 12 años. Las compras y las ventas los realiza en ventanas. Solicita el crédito para seguir trabajando, comprar abonos agrícolas.

 Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá pagar a los trabajadores. No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problemas. 
En el tiempo libre le gusta trabajar.
texts.en:
Rosa is 46 years old, she is a single mother of three children, and she lives with them (they are 19, 17, and 12 years old) in Ventana, in the province of Rios.

She is a member of VRC Las Palmas, which is located in the Campo Alegre precinct, in the canton of Bab, and which is an agricultural area.

Rosa has worked in agriculture for 12 years, planting corn and rice.  She makes her purchases and sales in Ventanas.  She is seeking a loan so that she can keep working and so that she can buy agricultural fertilizers.

With the money from this loan she will be able to pay the laborers.  She doesn't have any troubles.  In her free time she likes to work.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Khairy

texts.ru: Бурное развитие современного мира заставляет человека стараться больше для достижения успеха. Хайри старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Ее муж получает маленькую зарплату. Это зарплата не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Хайри решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес с шитьем и продажи национального одеяло, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. В дальнейшем она хочет открыть собственный цех и обучить учеников своим ремеслом. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки разновидных тканей для шитья одеяло, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Rapid development of the modern world forces one to try harder to achieve success. Khairy is trying to improve her family's quality of life and financial situation. She is married and raising two children. Her husband receives a small salary, which is insufficient to provide the family with all necessities of life. Khairy has decided to help her husband for the benefit of their family. To this end, she took the course "Succeed" organized by the Association of Businesswomen and received her graduation certificate. Now she is quite capable of starting her own business and becoming successful.

Khairy would like to focus her business on sewing traditional blankets for sale, as she has experience in this area. In the future, she wants to open her own workshop and train apprentices in her craft. In order to launch her business, she is requesting this loan of 4000 somoni to purchase various fabrics for sewing blankets. Khairy is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy different varieties of fabric for sewing traditional blankets

loans.name: Santiago Leonardo

texts.es:
Santiago Leonardo tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero vive con los padres en el Cantón Pueblo Viejo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el recinto El Marañón por la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo,  esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol.

Santiago se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol. Compra sus productos en Comercial  Agro insumos Karlita y los vende en el comercial Castillo.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y fréjol compra de insumos, abonos y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es incrementar el negocio.

Le gusta practicar el deporte en especial el indor.
texts.en:
Santiago Leonardo is 23 years old, he is single, and he lives with his parents in Pueblo Viejo.

He is a member of V.R.C. Unido Somos, which is located in the El Marañón precinct in the canton of Pueblo Viejo, an area dedicated to agriculture - particularly to corn, rice and beans.

Santiago works in agriculture and plants corn, rice and beans.  He buys his products and supplies in Agro and sells in Castillo.

He is seeking a credit so that he can plant corn, rice and beans.  He needs to buy supplies such as compost and fertilizers for his next harvest.  With the money from this loan he will be able to buy what he needs.  His challenges are the changing climate and the variation in weather.  His dream is to grow his business.

He likes to play sports, especially indoor soccer.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, composts, and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an internet cafe in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy computer supplies and repair her computer room.

Alicia has been in this business for six years. She earns more income from motorcycle transportation.

Alicia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy computer supplies and repair her computer room.

loans.name: Miralona

texts.en:
Miralona is 38 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, Miralona works very hard to provide for them.

Miralona runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell. She has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, sugar, spices, soap, shampoo, etc. 

In the future Miralona would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more jewelry to sell to customers.

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Arlyn is 23 years old and married with 3 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a direct selling business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell for her business.

Arlyn has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the direct selling for a year and also earns an income from a vulcanizing shop.

Arlyn aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell for her business

loans.name: Nhim

texts.en:
Nhim is 24 years old and the mother of two young children. Nhim wishes to improve her standard of living and obtain a better quality of life. This is why she strives to work harder to achieve her dreams. She operates a wide farmland, on which she and her spouse help each other in growing rice and other seasonal crops. They have been doing this business for nearly four years.

To improve the business, Nhim is asking for a loan of 500,000 KHR to hire a few laborers to work on her rice field and potatoes plantation. She says that the loan will enable her to increase the volume of her production in this coming season. She will use a portion of her profit to support her children’s education and save for future emergencies of the family.

loans.use: to hire a few laborers to work on her rice field and potatoes plantation.

loans.name: Donna

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Donna works hard to support her family.

Donna has a purified drinking water retail business in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from clothing and rice sales. Donna is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more purified drinking water to sell to her customers.

Donna has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more purified drinking water to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Ma. Charlene

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Ms. Charlene works hard to support her family.

Ms. Charlene has a fishing business in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from raising pigs. Ms. Charlene is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy fish nets for her fishing business.

Ms. Charlene has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets for her business.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбубе 38 лет. Она замужем. Ее муж Олим очень добрый и честный человек. Они воспитывают троих  детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 8 лет назад она начала свой бизнес с куплей продажей лекарств. Она имеет дополнительный бизнес скотоводство, в котором помогает ее муж. Ее эффективность помогает ей быть успешной в бизнесе. Она продает свой фармацевтический товар в аптеке и имеет большой круг клиентов. Несмотря на все ее достоинства, мощная конкуренция  делового мира, заставляет ее быть внимательной и обновлять товар. Она должна купить товар, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки лекарств, а также скота. Она ждет вашу доброту. Давайте, ей поможем держать свой стимул среди других бизнес леди!.
texts.en:
Mahbuba is 38 years old. She is married to Olim, who is a kind and honest person. Together, they are raising three children. In order to provide for her family, 8 years ago Mahbuba started her own business selling medication. Additionally, she runs a cattle breeding business with the help of her husband. Mahbuba's efficiency helps her to be successful in her enterprises. She sells the medical products in her pharmacy and has a large number of customers.

Despite Mahbuba's favourable position, powerful competition in the business world forces her to be attentive and update her merchandise. Presently, she needs to stock up on additional products but lacks the funds to do so. She is requesting a loan of US$3000 to purchase medication and also livestock. Mahbuba hopes for your kindness. Let us help her hold her own among other business ladies!

loans.use: to buy medicine for her pharmacy and cattle for her livestock business

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en:
Balqees is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. Her husband is a driver and earns insufficient income to support his family.

She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. She successfully runs the business of making sweaters at her home.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

She has gradually improved her business through support of the Kashf Foundation. Now she requested a loan of PKR 10,000 to purchase a bundle of wool of good quality in different colors to meet the increasing demand. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: To purchase a bundle of wool.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing materials for her fishing business.

Rosalina has been in this business for 23 years. Rosalina earns additional income from dried fish retail.

Rosalina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additinal fishing materials.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 27 years old and married. She has three children.

Michelle works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Michelle has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Michelle aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a sari-sari (variety) store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell.

NWTF is listing Gina's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Morita

texts.en:
Morita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years.

Morita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fishing gear and other equipment.

In the future, Morita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Erna Rose

texts.en:
Erna Rose is 26 years old and married. She has two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Erna Rose has been raising pigs for six years and also earns additional income from food vending.

Erna Rose is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Rizwana

texts.en:
Rizwana is a 25-year-old vigorous lady. She is married and a mother of three children. 

She has four buffalo and is successfully running the business of selling milk. Her husband is a sales person in a tuck shop and earns inadequate income to support his family.  

She initiated her business through support of the Kashf foundation. She says Kashf has bought a change to her family life, which increased her respect in the eyes of her husband and her whole family. 

She requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy one more buffalo and a cow to increase her sales. She hopes to increase her profit margin by improving in sales. She wishes to use earned profits on her children’s education and well being.

loans.use: To buy one more buffalo and a cow to increase her sales.

loans.name: Girishaka Group

texts.fr:
Berchmans fait partie du groupe Girishaka et  habite à Bujumbura. C’est un célibataire de  25ans. Il prend soins de ses3 petits frères qui étudient.

Il fait le commerce de la bière "Primus"  depuis  3ans. 

Il est à son deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital pour acheter beaucoup de caisses de bière "Primus" à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines années, il  voudrait acheter sa propre parcelle.
texts.en:
Berchmans lives in Bujumbura and is a member of the Girishaka group. He is 25 years old and single. He takes care of his three younger brothers who are students.

He has been selling "Primus" beer for three years now.

He is on his second loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan that he receives, he is going increase his capital so that he can buy lots of cases of "Primus" beer to resell and earn more money.

In the coming years, he would like to buy his own plot of land.

loans.use: to increase his capital so that he can buy lots of cases of "Primus" beer to resell and earn more money

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en:
Mejumaa used her previous Kiva loan to buy flour, sugar and cooking oil. Her loan was of much benefit because she was able to buy a larger amount of raw materials and get better prices for her dishes.

She’s currently applying for a new Kiva loan that she’ll use to renovate the business premise. She intends to purchase iron sheets and roofing nails, and to pay for labor.

Mejumaa sends the following message to Kiva lenders: “I am very grateful for the help received and I pray that God showers you with blessings.”

loans.use: to purchase iron sheets and roofing nails, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Sopio

texts.en:
Sopio is from the village of Patardzeuli, East Georgia. She is 42 years old. Sopio is married and lives with her son, a daughter-in-law and a daughter. 

The family earns a living through a dairy business. In particular, they have three milk cows. Sopio milks the cows and produces cheese. She sells milk and cheese locally. Sopio is a very hard-working woman, but she still doesn’t have enough income to make some savings and improve the living conditions of the family.
 
She requested a loan to purchase food for the cattle and to renovate her house. With this credit, she will purchase hay, which will be used for feeding the cows during the fall and winter seasons. Since the cows will be fed properly in winter, they will give a planned amount of milk to the family. Sopio also plans to purchase building materials and repair the house, which is old and damaged. Due to the above mentioned, the living conditions of the family will be improved and they will be able to spend their evenings after a hard working day in a more comfortable environment. Sopio hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase food for cattle and renovate her house.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
This time, Elvira is borrowing PHP 25,000 to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.
